budget","link":"https://www.businessinsider.com/best-hotels-jacuzzi-in-room","description":"<p class=\"financial-disclaimer\"><i>When you buy through our links, we may earn money from our affiliate partners. <a href=\"https://www.insider-inc.com/commerce-on-insider-inc/\">Learn more.</a></i></p><p><a href=\"https://www.anrdoezrs.net/links/6415797/type/dlg/https://www.hotels.com/ho535389/miraval-resort-and-spa-all-inclusive-tucson-united-states-of-america/\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"nofollow noopener sponsored\"><figure>\n\t<img src=\"https://i.insider.com/5f8dd7b8c21cfb0019468d66?format=jpeg\" alt=\"solace retreat v18545600\" height=\"952\" width=\"1270\" charset=\"\">\n<figcaption>\n<p class=\"copyright\">Miraval Resort</p>\n</figcaption>\n</figure></a></p><ul class=\"summary-list\"><li>For most Americans, international travel to exotic destinations is still off the table, but there are plenty of indulgent places to stay in the US.&#160;</li><li>For added luxury, or to simply savor extra room for social distancing, many hotels offer rooms with private jacuzzis for a spa-like stay.</li><li>We rounded up highly-rated hotels around the US with this desirable feature, ranging from $94 to $879 per night to start.</li><li>Read more:&#160;<a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/are-hotels-safe-coronavirus\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\" data-analytics-module=\"summary_bullets\" data-analytics-post-depth=\"0\" data-uri=\"1de2b7f85c20ff802b88e2dddc599fe1\">Is it safe to stay in a hotel right now? An infectious disease doctor, a cleaning expert, and hotel reps all share what you should know before you check-in.</a></li></ul><p>Pools and jacuzzis are practically synonymous with relaxing while on vacation, but during COVID-19, like many things, they now require advance planning and foresight. Just as with dining, dipping into the water doesn't necessitate mask-wearing, and may mean encountering others without the proper precautions.</p><p>And while many hotels offer enhanced safety measures such as reserving time slots in advance and limiting admission, there's nothing quite like having it all to yourself, pandemic or not. After all, a room with a private jacuzzi conjures up images of the ultimate in romantic luxury. In other words, it might be a good idea to keep this list handy for planning your next Valentine's Day, anniversary, birthday, or another special occasion.</p><p>In search of <a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/safe-vacations-during-covid\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">safer travel during COVID</a>, we rounded up highly-rated hotels across the country where you can soak while socially distancing. These picks are indulgent but still affordable and based on the following criteria:</p><ol><li><strong>Every hotel offers bookable rooms with a private jacuzzi in the room, typically ensuite or on a balcony.</strong></li><li><strong>These rooms offer accessible luxury and represent a variety of budgets, ranging between $94 and $879 per night.</strong></li><li><strong>Selections have high marks and numerous positive reviews on trusted traveler sites such as <a href=\"https://www.anrdoezrs.net/links/6415797/type/dlg/https://www.tripadvisor.com/\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"nofollow noopener sponsored\">Trip Advisor</a>, <a href=\"https://www.awin1.com/cread.php?awinmid=6776&awinaffid=257137&clickref=&ued=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.booking.com%2Findex.en-gb.htmlx.en-gb.html\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"nofollow noopener sponsored\">Booking.com</a>, and <a href=\"https://www.anrdoezrs.net/links/6415797/type/dlg/https://www.hotels.com/\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"nofollow noopener sponsored\">Hotels.com</a>.</strong></li><li><strong>We've personally stayed at many of these properties, with others ranking high with, or recommended by travelers and experts that we know and trust.</strong></li><li><strong>Hotels are enforcing strict COVID-19 policies and <a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/hotel-precautions-coronavirus\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">cleaning procedures</a>.</strong></li></ol><p>If you're wondering <a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/is-travel-safe-coronavirus\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">if travel is safe right now</a>, it's critical to note that until a vaccine is available — and perhaps even longer — there's no firm guarantee with regard to safety and travel. Therefore, it's important to follow guidelines from organizations like the CDC and WHO, as well as practice social distancing and safety measures such as wearing a mask and washing your hands.</p><p>Additionally, stay current on state travel restrictions and quarantine procedures before you book any travel, and factor in whether you're traveling to or from a hotspot, so as not to contribute to infection rares.</p><p>And if you do decide to splash out internationally, we also curated a list of the <a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/best-affordable-hotels-private-plunge-pools\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">best affordable hotel rooms with private plunge pools</a> around the world.</p><h2>These are the best affordable US hotels with private jacuzzis in the room, sorted by price from low to high.</h2>\n<div id=\"slideshow\">\n\tNew York - New York Las Vegas Hotel and Casino — Las Vegas, Nevada\n\t<figure>\n\t<img src=\"https://i.insider.com/5f89c7bed260780019341db7?format=jpeg\" alt=\"NewYorkNewYork_SpaSuite\" height=\"900\" width=\"1200\" charset=\"\">\n<figcaption>\n<p class=\"copyright\">New York – New York</p>\n</figcaption>\n</figure>\n\t<h2><a href=\"https://www.awin1.com/cread.php?awinmid=6776&#38;awinaffid=257137&#38;clickref=&#38;ued=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.booking.com%2Fhotel%2Fus%2Fnew-york-new-york.en-gb.html%3F\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"nofollow noopener sponsored\">Book New York - New York starting at $94 per night for the Spa Suite</a></h2><p>Located near the beginning of the Las Vegas Strip, the MGM property <a href=\"https://www.awin1.com/cread.php?awinmid=6776&#38;awinaffid=257137&#38;clickref=&#38;ued=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.booking.com%2Fhotel%2Fus%2Fnew-york-new-york.en-gb.html%3F\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"nofollow noopener sponsored\">New York - New York</a> offers guests a Vegas-style bite of the Big Apple. We've stayed here on two occasions and it's a cheerful, family-friendly hotel with a lot to offer those seeking a very affordable experience.</p><p>New York &#8211; New York is located directly across the street from the MGM Grand and next door to Excalibur, with a tram providing easy access to Luxor, Mandalay Bay, the Delano, and the Four Seasons, as well.</p><p>The Spa Suite includes an enormous in-room jacuzzi, positioned in a corner of the room and surrounded by mirrors for a cheeky, quintessential Las Vegas look. The suite is large, with a sitting area, in-room vanity, 42\" plasma flat-screen TV, and a separate shower in the bathroom. Like all MGM Resorts, <a href=\"https://www.awin1.com/cread.php?awinmid=6776&#38;awinaffid=257137&#38;clickref=&#38;ued=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.booking.com%2Fhotel%2Fus%2Fnew-york-new-york.en-gb.html%3F\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"nofollow noopener sponsored\">New York &#8211; New York</a> offers an app allowing guests to book restaurant reservations, skip check-in lines, unlock their room door, and browse recommendations.</p><p>Visitors can ride the Big Apple Coaster, the world's first with a 180-degree \"heartline\" twist and dive, and restaurants include Shake Shack, Starbucks, Tom's Urban, Village Street Eateries, and New York Pizzeria.&#160;</p><p><a href=\"https://www.anrdoezrs.net/links/6415797/type/dlg/https://www.tripadvisor.com/Hotel_Review-g45963-d91904-Reviews-New_York_New_York_Hotel_and_Casino-Las_Vegas_Nevada.html\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"nofollow noopener sponsored\"><strong>Trip Advisor</strong></a> <strong>Ranking</strong>: 92 out of 279 hotels in Las Vegas</p><p><a href=\"https://www.awin1.com/cread.php?awinmid=6776&#38;awinaffid=257137&#38;clickref=&#38;ued=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.booking.com%2Fhotel%2Fus%2Fnew-york-new-york.en-gb.html%3F\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"nofollow noopener sponsored\"><strong>Booking.com</strong></a> <strong>Rating</strong>: 8.2 out of 10</p><p><strong>Pros:</strong> Clover-shaped Spa Suite jacuzzis are huge &#8212; large enough for 3-4 people &#8212; providing ample bang for the buck.&#160;</p><p><strong>Cons:</strong> Rooms are occasionally a bit faded and not always as luxurious as other properties on the strip.</p><p><strong>COVID-19 status and policies: </strong>MGM Resorts team has been working with medical experts to develop a \"Seven-Point Safety Plan,\" which is a comprehensive, multi-layered approach with guidance from public health experts and includes:</p><ul><li>Screening, temperature checks, employee training, mandatory masks, and PPE.</li><li>Guests are to refrain from eating on the casino floor to minimize time without masks on.</li><li>Six-foot physical distancing policy and plexiglass barriers throughout casinos and lobbies, where appropriate.</li><li>Handwashing and enhanced sanitation include proven cleaning products in accordance with EPA guidelines. Electrostatic sprayers will be used in many large areas.</li><li>Custom-built sanitizing and handwashing stations, with soap and water.</li><li>Self and contactless check-in is offered with digital room keys.</li><li>The hair salon, pools, and cabanas are open, as is the fitness center. Pool access is on a first-come, first-served basis and may be limited, with guests joining a virtual waitlist if the pool reaches capacity.</li></ul>\n\tThe Samoset — Rockport, Maine\n\t<figure>\n\t<img src=\"https://i.insider.com/5f89c7369e9fe40019009c89?format=jpeg\" alt=\"Samoset_Hot_Tub_suite\" height=\"900\" width=\"1200\" charset=\"\">\n<figcaption>\n<p class=\"copyright\">The Samoset</p>\n</figcaption>\n</figure>\n\t<h2><a href=\"https://www.anrdoezrs.net/links/6415797/type/dlg/https://www.kayak.com/Rockport-Hotels-Samoset-Resort-Rockport.5136.ksp\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"nofollow noopener sponsored\">Book The Samoset starting at $189 per night for the Oceanview Hot Tub Suite</a></h2><p>A historic waterfront resort located on 230 acres overlooking Maine's Penobscot Bay, The Samoset dates back to 1889 and offers elegant accommodations that recall glamorous days gone by.</p><p>Highlights of staying here include an 18-hole championship golf course, a seaside spa and salon, tennis, basketball, lawn games, and a kids club for children ages five to 12.</p><p>There are&#160;178 comfortable and recently-renovated guest rooms and suites, decorated in a preppy, nautical style with shades of blue and cream and lots of natural light. Each room features 50\" HDTVs, iHome radios, Keurig coffee makers, in-room refrigerators, and private balcony or terraces. Then there are the Oceanview Hot Tub Suites, which offer oversized decks complete with whirlpools and privacy shades, all overlooking the bay.</p><p>For a deeper dip, there's also a 200,000-gallon family-friendly \"zero entry\" pool surrounded by fire pits that overlook the water, as well as oceanside dining at La Bella Vita restaurant.</p><p><a href=\"https://www.anrdoezrs.net/links/6415797/type/dlg/https://www.tripadvisor.com/Hotel_Review-g40841-d125126-Reviews-Samoset_Resort_On_The_Ocean-Rockport_Maine.html\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"nofollow noopener sponsored nofollow sponsored\"><strong>Trip Adviso</strong>r</a> <strong>Ranking</strong>: 6 out of 10 hotels in Rockport</p><p><a href=\"https://www.anrdoezrs.net/links/6415797/type/dlg/https://www.kayak.com/Rockport-Hotels-Samoset-Resort-Rockport.5136.ksp\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"nofollow noopener sponsored nofollow sponsored\"><strong>Booking.com</strong></a> <strong>Rating</strong>: 10 out of 10</p><p><strong>Pros:</strong> Views of Penobscot Bay are spectacular, and best enjoyed from Adirondack chairs on the expansive lawn or around fire pits roasting s'mores. Welcome amenities feature partnerships with local vendors.&#160;</p><p><strong>Cons:</strong> There is still a resort fee despite some amenities being closed due to COVID. Guests report that the staff can seem overworked. Housekeeping services are diminished in common areas and paused in guest rooms during stays.</p><p><strong>COVID-19 status and policies</strong>: This hotel is currently open and following new protocols including:</p><ul><li>Per the state of Maine, all individuals must wear cloth face coverings in public settings where other physical distancing measures are difficult to maintain.</li><li>Utilization of EPA-approved cleaning and disinfecting agents that kill the COVID-19 virus.</li><li>Hand sanitizer stations at high traffic guest touchpoints and signage throughout public spaces on cleanliness, social distancing, and hygiene.</li><li>Elimination and/or offering alternative options for any shared-use items that can't be cleaned after guest use.</li><li>Limiting team member room entry during stay (housekeeping, in-room dining)</li><li>Surface disinfecting wipes in guest rooms.</li></ul>\n\tPocono Palace Resort — East Stroudsburg, Pennsylvania\n\t<figure>\n\t<img src=\"https://i.insider.com/5f89c81a9e9fe40019009c90?format=jpeg\" alt=\"Pocono_Palace_champagne_tower\" height=\"900\" width=\"1200\" charset=\"\">\n<figcaption>\n<p class=\"copyright\">Pocono Palace Resort</p>\n</figcaption>\n</figure>\n\t<h2><a href=\"https://www.awin1.com/cread.php?awinmid=6776&#38;awinaffid=257137&#38;clickref=&#38;ued=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.booking.com%2Fhotel%2Fus%2Fpocono-palace-resort.en-gb.html%3F\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"nofollow noopener sponsored\">Book Pocono Palace Resort starting at $243 per night for a heart-shaped tub suite</a></h2><p>A couples-only retreat on Echo Lake in Pennsylvania's Pocono Mountains, <a href=\"https://www.awin1.com/cread.php?awinmid=6776&#38;awinaffid=257137&#38;clickref=&#38;ued=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.booking.com%2Fhotel%2Fus%2Fpocono-palace-resort.en-gb.html%3F\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"nofollow noopener sponsored\">Pocono Palace</a> Resort is part of a trio of romantic resorts billing themselves as the Land of Love.</p><p>Like a landlocked cruise ship, there's a packed itinerary with all-inclusive dining and a social director in charge of the numerous activities and entertainment options, including live bands, magicians, comedians, and DJs. There's also a 32,000 square foot sports arena, as well as 400 acres of land for couples to explore together.</p><p>But if that's too much action, just retreat to one of the large 188 suites with log-burning fireplaces, starry ceilings, and King-sized beds, many of which are heart-shaped. All rooms, including the entry-level suites, offer heart-shaped whirlpool tubs, while some, including the Champagne Tower Select and the Roman Tower, feature the famed 7-foot tall in-room Champagne Tower whirlpool. As the name implies, this jacuzzi is shaped like a giant champagne coupe and comes with the addition of a heart-shaped pool, a dry sauna, and a rain shower.&#160;</p><p><strong><a href=\"https://www.anrdoezrs.net/links/6415797/type/dlg/https://www.tripadvisor.com/Hotel_Review-g53117-d96601-Reviews-Pocono_Palace_Resort-Marshalls_Creek_Pocono_Mountains_Region_Pennsylvania.html\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"nofollow noopener sponsored\">Trip Advisor</a></strong> <strong>Ranking</strong>: 1 out of 2 hotels in Marshalls Creek</p><p><strong><a href=\"https://www.awin1.com/cread.php?awinmid=6776&#38;awinaffid=257137&#38;clickref=&#38;ued=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.booking.com%2Fhotel%2Fus%2Fpocono-palace-resort.en-gb.html%3F\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"nofollow noopener sponsored\">Booking.com</a> Rating</strong>: 7.8 out of 10</p><p><strong>Pros:</strong> Despite COVID, colder weather indoor activities are plentiful, including billiards, air hockey, tennis racquetball, indoor archery, an indoor pool, and a fitness room, while guests report good food and friendly staff.&#160;&#160;</p><p><strong>Cons:</strong> Even though the resort has been renovated, rooms can feel outdated and a \"cheesy\" atmosphere might not be everybody's cup of tea.</p><p><strong>COVID status and policies: </strong>COVID has shifted some of the resort's amenities and activities, but most remain open, albeit slightly modified as follows:</p><ul><li>Live entertainment is outdoors, while nightly shows are only open to hotel guests practicing social distancing.</li><li>The spa remains open, but with limited hours.</li><li>Breakfast and dinner service will continue as normal in the dining room during regular hours. Reservations required.</li><li>Indoor bar service will be limited. Service will be take-out or delivery only.&#160;</li><li>All guests must wear masks in public spaces at the resort.</li><li>Daily housekeeping will be unavailable at Cove Haven occupied suites to reduce contact. Items may be replenished upon request.</li><li>Water refill stations are not available at this time to aid in the prevention of spreading disease via the use of refillable water bottles.</li></ul>\n\tLa Quinta Resort and Club, a Waldorf-Astoria Resort — La Quinta, California\n\t<figure>\n\t<img src=\"https://i.insider.com/5f89c8c49e9fe40019009c95?format=jpeg\" alt=\"La_Quinta_King_Hacienda_Zia\" height=\"900\" width=\"1200\" charset=\"\">\n<figcaption>\n<p class=\"copyright\">La Quinta Resort and Club</p>\n</figcaption>\n</figure>\n\t<h2><a href=\"https://www.awin1.com/cread.php?awinmid=6776&#38;awinaffid=257137&#38;clickref=&#38;ued=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.booking.com%2Fhotel%2Fus%2Fla-quinta-resort-club.en-gb.html%3F\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"nofollow noopener sponsored\">Book La Quinta Resort and Club starting at $290 per night for an entry-level room</a></h2><p>A Waldorf-Astoria resort about half an hour outside of Palm Springs, the <a href=\"https://www.awin1.com/cread.php?awinmid=6776&#38;awinaffid=257137&#38;clickref=&#38;ued=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.booking.com%2Fhotel%2Fus%2Fla-quinta-resort-club.en-gb.html%3F\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"nofollow noopener sponsored\">La Quinta Resort and Club</a> is a nearly 100-year-old family-friendly property known for old Hollywood charm, a whopping 41 pools, and nearly 800 casitas, suites, and villas spread on 45 acres. Outdoor space is plentiful, well-landscaped, and enchanting, making for easier social distancing in the age of COVID-19 travel.</p><p>With casitas arranged around semi-private courtyards, pools are dotted throughout the property. We recently booked <a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/la-quinta-resort-hotel-review-palm-springs\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">a mid-tier King Starlight room for $322</a> and were able to upgrade to the 1,970 square foot King Hacienda Zia for $359 more, which <a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/la-quinta-resort-hotel-review-palm-springs\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">we reviewed in full</a>. It came with a full-sized private pool <em>and </em>a private hot tub, fire pit, and a large yard. It's important to note that, while affordable upgrades are possible, normally this room costs $1,300 per night.</p><p>There are several other rooms and suites with private pools and hot tubs, too, including the King Hideaway Suite with private hot tub from $1,136 per night, the King Pueblo Suite with a private pool from $1,420 per night, and the El Presidente suite with both a private pool and hot tub from $1,616 per night.</p><p>On previous trips, however, we've personally stayed in an entry-level Resort Casita, which is much more affordable at $290 per night, and located off the resort's 41 small communal pools.&#160;</p><p>Other activities are also plentiful, including tennis, pickleball, bike rentals, and four private golf courses.</p><p><a href=\"https://www.anrdoezrs.net/links/6415797/type/dlg/https://www.tripadvisor.com/Hotel_Review-g32584-d77460-Reviews-La_Quinta_Resort_Club_A_Waldorf_Astoria_Resort-La_Quinta_Greater_Palm_Springs_California.html\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"nofollow noopener sponsored\"><strong>Trip Advisor</strong></a><strong> Ranking</strong>: 3 out of 4 hotels in La Quinta</p><p><a href=\"https://www.awin1.com/cread.php?awinmid=6776&#38;awinaffid=257137&#38;clickref=&#38;ued=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.booking.com%2Fhotel%2Fus%2Fla-quinta-resort-club.en-gb.html%3F\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"nofollow noopener sponsored\"><strong>Booking.com</strong></a> <strong>Rating</strong>: 8.6 out of 10</p><p><strong>Pros:</strong> The resort is gorgeous, with ample lawn space for social distancing across 45 acres. Rooms, casitas, and common rooms feature Spanish-style architecture and an abundance of charm.</p><p><strong>Cons:</strong> While the concept of 41 pools is exciting, they can still be crowded, making social distancing difficult. supplement with digital or available upon request.&#160;</li><li>Improved guidelines for disinfecting fitness centers, possibly closing for cleaning multiple times daily, and limiting the number of guests allowed in at one time.&#160;</li><li>Increased frequency of cleaning public areas and provide stations at primary entrances and key high traffic areas, to allow guests to wipe the elevator button before pressing.&#160;</li><li>Contactless check-in using digital key technology for guests who desire to have a contactless arrival experience.</li></ul><h2><a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/la-quinta-resort-hotel-review-palm-springs\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">Read Business Insider's full hotel review for La Quinta Resort and Club</a></h2>\n\tThe Cosmopolitan of Las Vegas — Las Vegas, Nevada\n\t<figure>\n\t<img src=\"https://i.insider.com/5f89c6689e9fe40019009c87?format=jpeg\" alt=\"Terrace One Bedroom Japanese Soaking Tub_The Cosmopolitan of Las Vegas\" height=\"900\" width=\"1200\" charset=\"\">\n<figcaption>\n<p class=\"copyright\">The Cosmopolitan of Las Vegas</p>\n</figcaption>\n</figure>\n\t<h2><a href=\"https://go.skimresources.com?id=35871X943606&#38;xs=1&#38;url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.expedia.com%2FLas-Vegas-Hotels-The-Cosmopolitan-Of-Las-Vegas.h3818880.Hotel-Information\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"nofollow noopener sponsored\">Book The Cosmopolitan of Las Vegas starting at $280 per night for a Terrace Suite</a></h2><p>Located in the center of the Las Vegas Strip, <a href=\"https://go.skimresources.com?id=35871X943606&#38;xs=1&#38;url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.expedia.com%2FLas-Vegas-Hotels-The-Cosmopolitan-Of-Las-Vegas.h3818880.Hotel-Information\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"nofollow noopener sponsored\">The Cosmopolitan</a> is a sleek, stylish gaming resort with some of Sin City's best restaurants. Rooms are tech-forward, with an iPad controlling all the lighting and room settings such as curtains.&#160;</p><p>For a true splurge, book a Bungalow room with a private heated plunge pool on an outdoor terrace that comes with floor-to-ceiling windows overlooking the Marquee Dayclub pool. The hotel offers 125 sleek and charming guest rooms, plus two outdoor terraces and Brick, an outdoor wood-fired kitchen and bar, which remains open despite COVID.</p><p>Whirlpool King Bedrooms are available and come decked out with jetted tubs that are large enough for two. If Caesars is frenetic and bustling, Nobu Hotel is uber-Zen and quiet, with 182 stylish, Japanese-inspired rooms and suites. We've stayed at this property in the past and recommend it enthusiastically.</p><p>Inspired by Fuji-Hakone National Park, the 1,000 foot Hakone Suite, available as a 1-bedroom or 2-bedroom set-up, and includes a whirlpool tub as a nod to its namesake city Hakone in Japan, which is known for its hot springs. The suite also offers a living room and dining room, a large and airy full bathroom with a separate shower, as well as a half bathroom by the suite's entrance. Guests receive freshly prepared hot tea upon arrival and can choose between scented oils to help with sleep, while in-room dining from <a href=\"https://www.anrdoezrs.net/links/6415797/type/dlg/https://www.tripadvisor.com/Restaurant_Review-g45963-d3845751-Reviews-Nobu_Restaurant-Las_Vegas_Nevada.html\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"nofollow noopener sponsored\">Nobu Restaurant</a> is a notable perk. All rooms and suites include free Wi-Fi, a 55-inch flat-screen TV, an iPod docking station and Natura Bisse toiletries, as well as priority seating at Nobu Restaurant and Lounge.&#160;</p><p>Speaking of <a href=\"https://www.anrdoezrs.net/links/6415797/type/dlg/https://www.tripadvisor.com/Restaurant_Review-g45963-d3845751-Reviews-Nobu_Restaurant-Las_Vegas_Nevada.html\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"nofollow noopener sponsored\">Nobu Restaurant and Lounge</a> &#8212; at 11,200-square-feet, it's the world's largest, with the only teppan tables in the United States. Guests of the Nobu Hotel also have access to a private front desk and lounge on the hotel's 72nd floor, as well as access to the Venus Pool at Caesars Palace when it's open. Pre-COVID, amenities also included expedited line privilege at OMNIA nightclub, a complimentary Friday social hour, and a dedicated hotel concierge.</p><p><strong><a href=\"https://www.anrdoezrs.net/links/6415797/type/dlg/https://www.tripadvisor.com/Hotel_Review-g45963-d3907285-Reviews-Nobu_Hotel_at_Caesars_Palace-Las_Vegas_Nevada.html\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"nofollow noopener sponsored\"><strong>Booking.com</strong></a>&#160;<strong>Rating</strong>: 7.8 out of 10</p><p><strong>Pros:</strong> The hotel is exceedingly quiet and private, with a gorgeous Japanese-inspired design by noted architect David Rockwell.&#160;</p><p><strong>Cons:</strong> There's a steep resort fee of $45 per night plus tax, although parking fees have thankfully been eliminated.</p><p><strong>COVID-19 status and policies:</strong>&#160;</p><ul><li>For the well-being of team members and guests, Nobu Code Green housekeeping opt-in will be mandatory for all guests and there will be no housekeeping service during stays.</li><li>Resorts are cleaned and disinfected daily and throughout each shift and high touch items have been cleaned and disinfected between use.</li><li>Social distancing procedures are implemented, including appropriate signage in queuing areas and reduced capacities within casino floors, restaurants, and other seated venues.</li><li>Additional hand sanitizing stations have been added throughout the resort and hand sanitizer will be offered at check-in, table games, cage, and other transaction points.</li><li>Everyone indoors at all properties across the Caesars network is required to wear masks except when eating or drinking.</li><li>Front desks, tables and chairs, and other areas have been rearranged to allow for appropriate social distancing.</li><li>Self-serve items, such as condiments, have been removed and refills will not be provided.</li><li>Salons and spas will adjust schedules to allow for time to clean and disinfect surfaces.</li><li>Exercise machines will be cleaned and disinfected between use and mobile fitness equipment (dumbbells, mats, etc.) are target=\"_blank\" rel=\"nofollow noopener sponsored\">The Roxbury at Stratton Falls</a> and its sister property, The Roxbury Motel, both offer gorgeous, hugely over-the-top themed rooms providing eye-popping design and child-like wonder.</p><p>The properties are designed to be enormously entertaining and experiential, with each room, suite, or cottage boasting immersive visuals. There's a two-story superhero-themed cottage, a Cinderella cottage, and rooms inspired by \"The Wizard of Oz\" and \"Gilligan's Island.\"</p><p>The two-story King Arthur-esque Crown of the Pendragons Cottage, located in <a href=\"https://www.awin1.com/cread.php?awinmid=6776&#38;awinaffid=257137&#38;clickref=&#38;ued=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.booking.com%2Fhotel%2Fus%2Fthe-roxbury-roxbury.en-gb.html%3F\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"nofollow noopener sponsored\">The Roxbury at Stratton Falls</a> property, offers medieval theming, with dragons and swords and chain-mail aplenty. The highlight is most certainly the massive 86-gallon circular tub, which is technically not a hot tub, and far too spectacular to even remotely qualify as a bathtub. The tub rests in the center of a dedicated relaxation room, underneath a three-tiered, 20 foot-high crown chandelier. There are also chaise relaxation loungers, a 60\" television, full-size refrigerator, microwave, and wet bar sink, plus an open-air balcony with a \"drawbridge.\"&#160;</p><p><strong><a href=\"https://www.anrdoezrs.net/links/6415797/type/dlg/https://www.tripadvisor.com/Hotel_Review-g48530-d501799-Reviews-The_Roxbury_Contemporary_Catskill_Lodging-Roxbury_Catskill_Region_New_York.html\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"nofollow noopener sponsored\">Trip Advisor</a> Rating</strong>: 1 out of 1 hotel in Roxbury</p><p><strong><a href=\"https://www.awin1.com/cread.php?awinmid=6776&#38;awinaffid=257137&#38;clickref=&#38;ued=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.booking.com%2Fhotel%2Fus%2Fthe-roxbury-roxbury.en-gb.html%3F\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"nofollow noopener sponsored\">Booking.com</a> ranking</strong>: 9.4 out of 10</p><p><strong>Pros:</strong> Rooms, suites, and cottages are almost unspeakably cool, featuring such loving attention to detail that it's hard not to fall in love with the owners' vision. The property also includes a 50-foot waterfall and private nature trails, while guests report an immaculately clean stay.</p><p><strong>Cons:</strong> Due to COVID, the shared hot tub and pool at the Crooked Cabana require scheduled time slots and a $20 fee to use. (A potential pro for those who prefer strict social distancing and fewer people.)</p><p><strong>COVID-19 status and policies:</strong>&#160;</p><ul><li>All linens are sanitized in a high-temperature wash.</li><li>Face masks are required for staff and guests in public areas, floors are marked for social distancing, and hand sanitizer is available.</li><li>Regularly sanitizing of high-traffic areas with contactless check-in and check-out offered.</li><li>Individually wrapped toiletries and&#160;24-hour minimum vacancy between guests.</li></ul>\n\tSybaris Pool Suites — Indianapolis, Indiana\n\t<figure>\n\t<img src=\"https://i.insider.com/5f89c93d9e9fe40019009c96?format=jpeg\" alt=\"Sybaris_pool_suite\" height=\"900\" width=\"1200\" charset=\"\">\n<figcaption>\n<p class=\"copyright\">Sybaris Pool Suites</p>\n</figcaption>\n</figure>\n\t<h2><a href=\"https://www.anrdoezrs.net/links/6415797/type/dlg/https://www.hotels.com/ho454719/sybaris-pool-suites-indianapolis-indianapolis-united-states-of-america/\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"nofollow nofollow noopener sponsored sponsored\">Book Sybaris Pool Suites starting at $459 per night for a Chalet Suite</a></h2><p>Every suite has its own private pool at the aptly-named <a href=\"https://www.anrdoezrs.net/links/6415797/type/dlg/https://www.hotels.com/ho454719/sybaris-pool-suites-indianapolis-indianapolis-united-states-of-america/\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"nofollow noopener sponsored nofollow sponsored\">Sybaris Pool Suites</a>, an adults-only property with sister locations around Illinois and in Wisconsin. Suites range from entry-level Country Whirlpool Suites with four-foot by six-foot whirlpool tubs, patios, and fireplaces, to enormous two-story Chalet Swimming Pool Suites.</p><p>The Chalet Suites are the undeniable stars of the show, with not only a whirlpool tub in the bedroom, but also come with a private 22-foot heated indoor swimming pool all within the confines of the room. The pool comes complete with a tropical waterfall, misting steam room, and bedroom loft connected to a 10-foot waterslide that leads directly into the pool below. On top of all that, guests have their own parking garage connected directly to the two-story suite for private entry, and other highlights include a massage chair.</p><p>The property itself is designed to evoke romance and let couples relax privately, including ambient lighting, rose petals on the bed, the ability to schedule mini-getaways for an afternoon.</p><p><a href=\"https://www.anrdoezrs.net/links/6415797/type/dlg/https://www.tripadvisor.com/Hotel_Review-g37209-d120769-Reviews-Sybaris_Indianapolis-Indianapolis_Indiana.html\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"nofollow noopener sponsored\"><strong>Trip Advisor</strong></a><strong> Rating</strong>: 1 out of 9 specialty lodging in Indianapolis</p><p><a href=\"https://www.anrdoezrs.net/links/6415797/type/dlg/https://www.hotels.com/ho454719/sybaris-pool-suites-indianapolis-indianapolis-united-states-of-america/\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"nofollow nofollow noopener sponsored sponsored\"><strong>Hotels.com</strong></a> <strong>Ranking</strong>: 9.2 of 10</p><p><strong>Pros:</strong> Pools and suites are clean, with each inspected before every guest's stay, with diagnostic systems testing pH balance and sanitation levels, and constant advanced filtration.</p><p><strong>Cons:</strong> While water pressure is good in the whirlpool tub, some guests report poor pressure in the showers. Wi-Fi can also be spotty, and there are no windows, which adds to the privacy for some but might feel claustrophobic to others.</p><p><strong>COVID-19 status and policies:</strong>&#160;</p><ul><li>Every piece of linen is washed in 160-degree water with bleach and placed in rooms fresh after every stay.&#160;</li><li>Edible treats such as chocolate-covered strawberries are paused due to COVID.</li><li>Every pool is cleaned and inspected to ensure proper disinfection and alkalinity.&#160;&#160;</li><li>Revised cancellation policy without fees or penalties.&#160;</li><li>Additional disinfection protocols include cleaning doorknobs, door handles, pillows, and the mattress is disinfected after every stay, every time.&#160;&#160;</li><li>Individually wrapped plastic cups in the suites whenever possible.&#160;</li><li>Sybaris locations do not have hallways, elevators, gyms, common areas, or restaurants.</li></ul>\n\tTrappeur’s Crossing Resort — Steamboat Springs, Colorado\n\t<figure>\n\t<img src=\"https://i.insider.com/5f89cc7cd260780019341dd2?format=jpeg\" alt=\"BL6105 in Bear Lodge at Trappeur&#39;s Crossing Resort\" height=\"900\" width=\"1200\" charset=\"\">\n<figcaption>\n<p class=\"copyright\">Trappeur’s Crossing Resort</p>\n</figcaption>\n</figure>\n\t<h2><a href=\"https://www.awin1.com/cread.php?awinmid=6776&#38;awinaffid=257137&#38;clickref=&#38;ued=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.booking.com%2Fhotel%2Fus%2Ftrappeurs-crossing-resort-by-resortquest.en-gb.html%3Flabel%3Dgen173nr-1DCAso7AFCKHRyYXBwZXVycy1jcm9zc2luZy1yZXNvcnQtYnktcmVzb3J0cXVlc3RIM1gEaKQCiAEBmAEJuAEHyAEM2AED6AEBiAIBqAIDuALrhKf8BcACAdICJDA3NTc1NWFlLWVmZWUtNGUwYy05ZmM4LTFhOTU3YmQxZjJjMdgCBOACAQ%3Bsid%3D0694b031d8e2b987d37291e7ea4ff96b%3Bdist%3D0%26group_adults%3D2%26group_children%3D0%26keep_landing%3D1%26no_rooms%3D1%26sb_price_type%3Dtotal%26type%3Dtotal%26\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"nofollow noopener sponsored\">Book Bear Lodge at Trappeur's Crossing Resort starting at $504 per night for a Condo with Private Patio, Hot Tub, and Fireplace</a></h2><p>Located only two blocks from the Champagne Powder slopes in Steamboat Springs, Colorado, <a href=\"https://www.awin1.com/cread.php?awinmid=6776&#38;awinaffid=257137&#38;clickref=&#38;ued=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.booking.com%2Fhotel%2Fus%2Ftrappeurs-crossing-resort-by-resortquest.en-gb.html%3Flabel%3Dgen173nr-1DCAso7AFCKHRyYXBwZXVycy1jcm9zc2luZy1yZXNvcnQtYnktcmVzb3J0cXVlc3RIM1gEaKQCiAEBmAEJuAEHyAEM2AED6AEBiAIBqAIDuALrhKf8BcACAdICJDA3NTc1NWFlLWVmZWUtNGUwYy05ZmM4LTFhOTU3YmQxZjJjMdgCBOACAQ%3Bsid%3D0694b031d8e2b987d37291e7ea4ff96b%3Bdist%3D0%26group_adults%3D2%26group_children%3D0%26keep_landing%3D1%26no_rooms%3D1%26sb_price_type%3Dtotal%26type%3Dtotal%26\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"nofollow noopener sponsored\">Trappeur's Crossing Resort</a> is a massive property with six different lodges featuring multiple types of vacation rental condos. On property, guests can choose from four pools, 10 hot tubs, and two tennis courts, as well as a fitness center, business center, and shuttle service.</p><p>Within Bear Lodge &#8212; the newest accommodations at <a href=\"https://www.awin1.com/cread.php?awinmid=6776&#38;awinaffid=257137&#38;clickref=&#38;ued=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.booking.com%2Fhotel%2Fus%2Ftrappeurs-crossing-resort-by-resortquest.en-gb.html%3Flabel%3Dgen173nr-1DCAso7AFCKHRyYXBwZXVycy1jcm9zc2luZy1yZXNvcnQtYnktcmVzb3J0cXVlc3RIM1gEaKQCiAEBmAEJuAEHyAEM2AED6AEBiAIBqAIDuALrhKf8BcACAdICJDA3NTc1NWFlLWVmZWUtNGUwYy05ZmM4LTFhOTU3YmQxZjJjMdgCBOACAQ%3Bsid%3D0694b031d8e2b987d37291e7ea4ff96b%3Bdist%3D0%26group_adults%3D2%26group_children%3D0%26keep_landing%3D1%26no_rooms%3D1%26sb_price_type%3Dtotal%26type%3Dtotal%26\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"nofollow noopener sponsored\">Trappeur's Crossing</a> &#8212; the five-bedroom, five-bathroom BL6105 condo is one of two on property with a private courtyard, including an outdoor fireplace, and a large gas BBQ grill. The pi&#232;ce de r&#233;sistance is the condo's private outdoor hot tub, with ski mountain views, and is perfect for warming up at the end of a cold day on the slopes. The unit sleeps up to 12 and includes a washer/dryer, as well as a fully-equipped gourmet kitchen, stainless steel appliances, a four-burner gas cook-top stove, and luxurious wood cabinetry. There's also a wine cooler, spacious living area, and gas log fireplace.</p><p>Naturally, the resort shines in winter, when ski bunnies flock, but there's also hiking, three 18-hole golf courses, fly-fishing, and biking trails.&#160;</p><p><strong><a href=\"https://www.anrdoezrs.net/links/6415797/type/dlg/https://www.tripadvisor.com/Hotel_Review-g33657-d263350-Reviews-Trappeur_s_Crossing_Resort_by_Simply_Steamboat-Steamboat_Springs_Colorado.html\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"nofollow noopener sponsored\">Trip Advisor</a> Ranking:</strong> 4 out of 85 specialty lodging in Steamboat Springs</p><p><strong><a href=\"https://www.awin1.com/cread.php?awinmid=6776&#38;awinaffid=257137&#38;clickref=&#38;ued=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.booking.com%2Fhotel%2Fus%2Ftrappeurs-crossing-resort-by-resortquest.en-gb.html%3Flabel%3Dgen173nr-1DCAso7AFCKHRyYXBwZXVycy1jcm9zc2luZy1yZXNvcnQtYnktcmVzb3J0cXVlc3RIM1gEaKQCiAEBmAEJuAEHyAEM2AED6AEBiAIBqAIDuALrhKf8BcACAdICJDA3NTc1NWFlLWVmZWUtNGUwYy05ZmM4LTFhOTU3YmQxZjJjMdgCBOACAQ%3Bsid%3D0694b031d8e2b987d37291e7ea4ff96b%3Bdist%3D0%26group_adults%3D2%26group_children%3D0%26keep_landing%3D1%26no_rooms%3D1%26sb_price_type%3Dtotal%26type%3Dtotal%26\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"nofollow noopener sponsored\">Booking.com</a> Rating:</strong> 9.3 out of 10</p><p><strong>Pros:</strong> The resort offers a free shuttle, dropping off guests anywhere in town upon request.</p><p><strong>Cons:</strong> The sauna is closed (as are the communal hot tubs), while some resort amenities are dated and could benefit from renovations.&#160;</p><p><strong>COVID-19 status and policies:</strong>&#160;</p><ul><li>Reduced front desk hours and limited in-person availability.&#160;</li><li>All outdoor swimming pools are open under occupancy, disinfection, and social distancing restrictions and on a first-come, first-serve basis.</li><li>Tennis courts and the fitness center are open on a reservation basis.</li><li>Other amenities including hot tubs, the conference room, and sauna are closed and an opening date has not been determined.&#160;</li><li>All people in Colorado who are 11 years and older are required to wear a covering over their noses and mouths according to state mandates when entering or moving within any public indoor space.</li></ul>\n\tSanctuary on Camelback Mountain Resort & Spa​ – Paradise Valley, Arizona\n\t<figure>\n\t<img on Camelback Mountain Resort &#38; Spa​</p>\n</figcaption>\n</figure>\n\t<h2><a href=\"https://www.awin1.com/cread.php?awinmid=6776&#38;awinaffid=257137&#38;clickref=&#38;ued=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.booking.com%2Fhotel%2Fus%2Fsanctuary-camelback-mountain.en-gb.html\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"nofollow noopener sponsored\">Book Sanctuary on Camelback Mountain Resort &#38; Spa starting at $579 per night for a Spa Suite</a></h2><p>Only 10 minutes from Old Town Scottsdale, the 53-acre <a href=\"https://www.awin1.com/cread.php?awinmid=6776&#38;awinaffid=257137&#38;clickref=&#38;ued=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.booking.com%2Fhotel%2Fus%2Fsanctuary-camelback-mountain.en-gb.html\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"nofollow noopener sponsored\">Sanctuary on Camelback Mountain Resort &#38; Spa</a> is located in tony Paradise Valley and is known for its 109&#160;luxurious casitas, suites, and villas.</p><p>There's also a Zen, Asian-inspired destination spa, one of Arizona's finest, with Watsu water treatments, a labyrinth walking meditation, and a reflection pond. Though it's been years since our last visit, we look back on our stay here especially fondly.</p><p><a href=\"https://www.awin1.com/cread.php?awinmid=6776&#38;awinaffid=257137&#38;clickref=&#38;ued=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.booking.com%2Fhotel%2Fus%2Fsanctuary-camelback-mountain.en-gb.html\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"nofollow noopener sponsored\">Sanctuary</a>'s spa vibe continues in the resort's 1,200 square-foot Spa Suites, where private outdoor soaking tubs and chaise relaxation loungers are the focal point of your own patio, each designed to bring the spa into the room itself. Elsewhere in the suite, there's a living area with a fireplace and wet bar plus a rain shower. Rooms are contemporary and design-forward, offering a seating area, free Wi-Fi, and flat-screen cable TV with Google Chromecast, as well as robes and flip flops, Molton Brown bath amenities, bath salts, and a pillow-top mattress with plush linens.</p><p>Other property highlights s include tennis, hiking, an infinity pool, and nearby golf courses and hiking on scenic Camelback Mountain.</p><p><a href=\"https://www.anrdoezrs.net/links/6415797/type/dlg/https://www.tripadvisor.com/Hotel_Review-g31300-d189075-Reviews-Sanctuary_Camelback_Mountain-Paradise_Valley_Arizona.html\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"nofollow noopener sponsored\"><strong>Trip Advisor</strong></a><strong> Ranking:</strong> 3 out of 5 hotels in Paradise Valley</p><p><a href=\"https://www.awin1.com/cread.php?awinmid=6776&#38;awinaffid=257137&#38;clickref=&#38;ued=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.booking.com%2Fhotel%2Fus%2Fsanctuary-camelback-mountain.en-gb.html\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"nofollow noopener sponsored\"><strong>Booking.com</strong></a><strong> Rating:</strong> 9.0 out of 10</p><p><strong>Pros:</strong> For a $100 refundable deposit, the resort is exceedingly pet-friendly, welcoming cats and dogs up to 50 pounds. Animals receive a welcome letter and an arrival gift, plus a kitty litter box or puppy waste disposal bags. There are also several pet-friendly areas.&#160;</p><p><strong>Cons</strong>: Some rooms have parking lot views. Breakfast is extravagant and praise-worthy, though not included in room fees without upgrades.</p><p><strong>COVID-19 status and policies:</strong>&#160;</p><ul><li>All items touched by a guest or team member are sanitized after every in-person interaction.</li><li>Appropriate social distancing maintained during all in-person interactions and plexiglass shields are installed at the front desk.&#160;&#160;</li><li>All housekeeping are provided with masks and gloves and daily housekeeping and turndown services are available only upon request.</li><li>Tables and chairs in all public spaces spaced to ensure guests are six-feet apart.</li><li>Single-use menus and wine lists are utilized in dining areas.</li><li>Use of industrial electrostatic sanitization in all treatment rooms, men's and women's lounges, quiet room, spa lobby, gym, and movement studio with increased time between spa treatments. Therapists and guests required to wear face masks during treatments.</li><li>Reduced fitness class capacity to ensure adequate space for social distancing during classes.</li></ul>\n\tMiraval Resort and Spa – Tucson, Arizona\n\t<figure>\n\t<img src=\"https://i.insider.com/5f8dc28b9e9fe4001900a1ee?format=jpeg\" alt=\"solace retreat v18545600\" height=\"953\" width=\"1271\" charset=\"\">\n<figcaption>\n<p class=\"copyright\">Miraval Resort</p>\n</figcaption>\n</figure>\n\t<h2><a href=\"https://www.anrdoezrs.net/links/6415797/type/dlg/https://www.hotels.com/ho535389/miraval-resort-and-spa-all-inclusive-tucson-united-states-of-america/\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"nofollow noopener sponsored\">Book Miraval Resort and Spa starting at $879 per night for the Desert Sky Double Suite or Solace Retreat, all-inclusive</a></h2><p>Located on 400 acres outside Tucson in the shadow of the Santa Catalina Mountains, <a href=\"https://www.anrdoezrs.net/links/6415797/type/dlg/https://www.hotels.com/ho535389/miraval-resort-and-spa-all-inclusive-tucson-united-states-of-america/\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"nofollow noopener sponsored\">Miraval</a> is a world-renowned destination spa resort prioritizing wellness that aims to bring guests back into balance.</p><p>The resort's Life in Balance Spa, which we have visited and recommend without hesitation, features a myriad of services including Ayurveda, energy work, traditional massage, and acupuncture. Though some spa services are paused, outdoor therapies are available soon.&#160;</p><p>The 800 square foot Desert Sky Double Suite is large and features a jacuzzi tub plus a separate walk-in shower. There are also zen touches such as a meditation pillow from an organic pillow menu, a Tibetan singing bowl, mindful coloring books, a community journal, and an essential oil diffuser, available on request. Space is ample, with a patio for reflection, a cozy fireplace in the living room, and a separate dining room.&#160;</p><p>Or, the Solace Retreat, while smaller, is tailor-made for spa-like relaxation, with its own outdoor patio with a private hot tub, a celestial rain shower, and a lounge area with a fire pit. Other touches include an aromatherapy diffuser, fluffy cotton bathrobes, an indoor soaking tub, and a sitting area, plus views of the Santa Catalina Mountains.</p><p>The resort is a digital, device-free space, where guests are asked to unplug at check-in and place their phones and devices in a special \"sleeping bag\" to better center themselves.</p><p>Room rates also include a $175 nightly credit, all meals, and more than 200 classes and activities ranging from outback hiking and biking to challenge courses. For additional fees, offerings include equine therapy (such as painting with the side of a horse as the canvas!), \"conscious cooking\" classes, beekeeping workshops, and wine tasting. All food is local, with mindful eating of fresh, high-quality ingredients an integral part of <a href=\"https://www.anrdoezrs.net/links/6415797/type/dlg/https://www.hotels.com/ho535389/miraval-resort-and-spa-all-inclusive-tucson-united-states-of-america/\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"nofollow noopener sponsored\">the Miraval</a> experience.</p><p><strong><a href=\"https://www.anrdoezrs.net/links/6415797/type/dlg/https://www.tripadvisor.com/Hotel_Review-g60950-d112501-Reviews-Miraval_Arizona-Tucson_Arizona.html\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"nofollow noopener sponsored\">Trip Advisor</a> Ranking:</strong> 2 out of 134 hotels in Tucson</p><p><strong><a href=\"https://www.anrdoezrs.net/links/6415797/type/dlg/https://www.hotels.com/ho535389/miraval-resort-and-spa-all-inclusive-tucson-united-states-of-america/\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"nofollow noopener sponsored\">Hotels.com</a> Rating:</strong> 4.5 out of 5</p><p><strong>Pros:</strong> Meals and many activities are all-inclusive, making for tremendous value, particularly considering the exceptional quality of the food.</p><p><strong>Cons:</strong> Due to COVID, much of the resort's spa &#8212; a huge draw &#8212; is closed. However, there are numerous outdoor activities available that remain open.</p><p><strong>COVID-19 status and policies:</strong>&#160;</p><ul><li><a href=\"https://www.anrdoezrs.net/links/6415797/type/dlg/https://www.hotels.com/ho535389/miraval-resort-and-spa-all-inclusive-tucson-united-states-of-america/\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"nofollow noopener sponsored\">Miraval Arizona</a> is taking advance and extensive cleaning protocols prior to arrival. Guestrooms are disinfected, sanitized, and sealed until the next guest arrives.</li><li>Housekeeping is only available upon request with contactless delivery for any requested items.&#160;</li><li>GBAC STARTM cleanliness and training accreditation process through the Global Biorisk Advisory Council (GBAC) at all Miraval properties and Life in Balance Spas.</li><li>Face coverings will be required in hotel indoor public areas and the spa, as well as any outdoor spaces where physical distancing cannot be observed.</li><li>The capacity of some experiences and activities are reduced with limited availability. Advance reservations are strongly recommended.</li><li>There is a limited menu of spa services and capacity. Advance spa reservations are required.&#160;Locker rooms, saunas, steam rooms, and whirlpools are closed. Guests are required to wear a mask, with the exception of facial treatments.</li></ul>\n</div><div class=\"read-original\">Read the original article on <a Courtney)","articleImgCdnMap":{"https://i.insider.com/5f8dd7b8c21cfb0019468d66?format=jpeg":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx1/cdn36@2020_1/2020/10/20/02-05-17-478_7c7bbd3b276fe9a0.webp","https://i.insider.com/5f89c7bed260780019341db7?format=jpeg":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx14/cdn75@2020_5/2020/10/20/02-05-18-560_a6c6f57d756089bd.webp","https://i.insider.com/5f89c7369e9fe40019009c89?format=jpeg":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx4/cdn76@2020_5/2020/10/20/02-05-25-121_399d92fa28789544.webp","https://i.insider.com/5f89c81a9e9fe40019009c90?format=jpeg":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx18/cdn76@2020_3/2020/10/20/02-05-18-201_68920e8b8f552aec.webp","https://i.insider.com/5f89c8c49e9fe40019009c95?format=jpeg":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx27/cdn20@2020_3/2020/10/20/02-05-23-095_92f976f8a96164c3.webp","https://i.insider.com/5f89c6689e9fe40019009c87?format=jpeg":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx21/cdn28@2020_4/2020/10/20/02-05-20-782_8ceb7c12176f6a86.webp","https://i.insider.com/5f89ca89d260780019341dcb?format=jpeg":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx16/cdn48@2020_1/2020/10/20/02-05-20-986_2b25f58d785dd08d.webp","https://i.insider.com/5f89cd0a9e9fe40019009caa?format=jpeg":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx12/cdn60@2020_1/2020/10/20/02-05-21-177_21fbdc685100d6b4.webp","https://i.insider.com/5f8db84ac21cfb0019468c9a?format=jpeg":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx32/cdn75@2020_5/2020/10/20/02-05-20-489_7cb69a500a01d1b1.webp","https://i.insider.com/5f89c93d9e9fe40019009c96?format=jpeg":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx18/cdn52@2020_4/2020/10/20/02-05-16-048_f08291b324bdefa3.webp","https://i.insider.com/5f89cc7cd260780019341dd2?format=jpeg":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx11/cdn80@2020_1/2020/10/20/02-05-25-171_6c0b7b4f36644a22.webp","https://i.insider.com/5f89ca0e9e9fe40019009c9d?format=jpeg":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx30/cdn59@2020_1/2020/10/20/02-05-25-193_cfd9f3d0d3575e8b.webp","https://i.insider.com/5f8dc28b9e9fe4001900a1ee?format=jpeg":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx5oss/cdn15@2020_5/2020/10/20/02-05-24-768_474d834a2e1ef30b.webp","http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/businessinsider?d=yIl2AUoC8zA":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx15/cdn67@2020_3/2020/10/20/02-05-22-757_cc3ef43fc8ff5801.webp","http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/businessinsider?i=pTnjWH-9VaM:SmgIwgqhmD0:F7zBnMyn0Lo":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx22/cdn51@2020_4/2020/10/20/02-05-20-997_1484e0031ab85ad1.webp","http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/businessinsider?i=pTnjWH-9VaM:SmgIwgqhmD0:V_sGLiPBpWU":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx21/cdn52@2020_6/2020/10/20/02-05-22-606_bd4da06f8c7a0d9f.webp","http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/businessinsider?d=qj6IDK7rITs":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx30/cdn79@2020_1/2020/10/20/02-05-18-571_740defb435ea442b.webp","http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/businessinsider?i=pTnjWH-9VaM:SmgIwgqhmD0:gIN9vFwOqvQ":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx19/cdn12@2020_6/2020/10/20/02-05-20-642_6a3511405dee0104.webp","http://feeds.feedburner.com/~r/businessinsider/~4/pTnjWH-9VaM":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx25/cdn19@2020_2/2020/10/20/02-05-18-198_db7d7b5b0f5cc5e8.webp"},"publishedOrCreatedDate":1603159473357},{"createdTime":"2020-10-20 10:04:33","updatedTime":"2020-10-20 10:04:33","title":"Presidential debate commission allows for muting microphones so Trump and Biden can have uninterrupted time","link":"https://www.businessinsider.com/presidential-debate-commission-allows-muting-mics-for-uninterrupted-time-2020-10","description":"<figure>\n\t<img src=\"https://i.insider.com/5f8e27adc21cfb0019468eba?format=jpeg\" alt=\"Biden Trump Presidential Debate\" height=\"1600\" width=\"3200\" charset=\"\">\n<figcaption>Democratic Presidential candidate and former US Vice President Joe Biden (L) and US President Donald Trump speaking during the first presidential debate at the Case Western Reserve University and Cleveland Clinic in Cleveland, Ohio on September 29, 2020.\n<p class=\"copyright\">Jim Watson, Saul Loeb/AFP via Getty Images</p>\n</figcaption>\n</figure><ul class=\"summary-list\">\n<li>The Commission on Presidential Debates announced it will employ new rules at the next debate to mute microphones to allow each presidential candidate gets two minutes of uninterrupted time.</li>\n<li>The move was designed to provide \"additional structure ... to the format of the remaining debates in order to ensure a more orderly discussion of the issues,\" according to a&#160;<a href=\"https://twitter.com/ZekeJMiller/status/1318340457601126400/photo/1\">statement</a> from the commission.</li>\n<li>President Donald Trump and Democratic presidential nominee Joe Biden will appear on the debate stage for a second time on October 22 in Nashville.</li>\n<li>A post-debate analysis by <a href=\"https://www.washingtonpost.com/politics/2020/09/30/trump-was-interrupter-in-chief-tuesdays-debate-it-wasnt-close/\">The Washington Post</a> found that interjections by Trump accounted for more than 75% of interruptions that happened during the debate as a whole.</li>\n<li><a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/?hprecirc-bullet\">Visit Business Insider's homepage for more stories</a>.</li>\n</ul><p>The Commission on Presidential Debates announced a new rule to mute microphones, allowing each candidate to have two minutes of uninterrupted time.</p><p>The move was designed to provide \"additional structure ... to the format of the remaining debates in order to ensure a more orderly discussion of the issues,\" according to a statement from the commission.</p><p>Following the first debate between President Donald Trump and Democratic presidential nominee Joe Biden, the commission wrote in the statement that it \"has considered the opinion of many who expressed concern that the debate fell short of expectations, depriving voters of the opportunity to be informed of the candidates' positions on the issues.\"</p><p>\"The Commission is announcing today that in order to enforce this agreed upon rule, the only candidate whose microphone will be open during these two-minute periods is the candidate who has the floor under the rules,\" the statement read.</p><p>\"For the balance of each segment, which by design is intended to be dedicated to open discussion, both candidates' microphones will be open.\"</p><blockquote class=\"twitter-tweet blockquote\" data-lang=\"en\" data-cards=\"\" data-conversation=\"\">&#8212;Zeke Miller  (@ZekeJMiller) <a href=\"https://twitter.com/mims/statuses/1318340457601126400?ref_src=twsrc%5Etfw\">October 19, 2020</a></blockquote><script async src=\"//platform.twitter.com/widgets.js\" charset=\"utf-8\"></script><p>&#160;</p><p>Trump and Biden will appear on the debate stage for a second time on October 22 in Nashville.</p><p>Tensions were high during the first presidential debate on September 29 as moderator Chris Wallace had trouble reining in the candidates, who were cutting into the other's speaking time.</p><p>A post-debate analysis by <a href=\"https://www.washingtonpost.com/politics/2020/09/30/trump-was-interrupter-in-chief-tuesdays-debate-it-wasnt-close/\">The Washington Post</a> found that interjections by Trump accounted for more than 75% of interruptions that happened during the debate as a whole. A count by <a href=\"https://slate.com/news-and-politics/2020/09/trump-interruptions-first-presidential-debate-biden.html\">Slate</a> said the president interrupted both Biden and Wallace a total of at least 128 times.</p><p>Another debate was scheduled for October 15, which was planned to take place virtually after Trump tested positive for COVID-19 earlier this month. The Trump campaign indicated that it did not want to participate in the debate virtually, and the Biden campaign went on to schedule a town hall with ABC News for the same day.</p><p>The Trump campaign subsequently planned a town hall with NBC News at the same time, and the debate commission released a statement on October 9 that the second debate would be cancelled in light of the separate events.</p><p>In the statement from the debate commission regarding the new rules, the panel recognized that \"neither campaign may be totally satisfied with the measures announced today. One may think they go too far, and one may think they do not go far enough.\"</p><p>\"We are comfortable that these actions strike the right balance and that they are in the interest of the American people, for whom these debates are held,\" the statement concluded.</p><div class=\"read-original\">Read the original article on <a agencies","link":"https://www.businessinsider.com/business-insiders-top-advertising-and-media-stories-for-october-20-2020-10","description":"<p>Hi! Welcome to the Insider Advertising daily for October 20. I'm Lauren Johnson, a senior advertising reporter at Business Insider. <a href=\"http://newsletter.businessinsider.com/join/4np/insider-advertising\" data-analytics-module=\"body_link\" data-analytics-post-depth=\"20\">Subscribe here to get this newsletter in your inbox every weekday.</a> Send me feedback or tips at <a data-analytics-module=\"body_link\" data-analytics-post-depth=\"20\">ljohnson@businessinsider.com.</a></p><p><strong>Today's news:</strong> Edelman's revenue rebounds, how WarnerMedia markets HBO Now, and new data about YouTube's most-popular videos.</p><hr><section><h3><a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/edelman-takes-on-advertising-with-earned-creative-pitch-2020-10\"><figure>\n\t<img src=\"https://i.insider.com/5f57c14a7ed0ee001e25dfad?format=jpeg\" alt=\"Edelman Getty\" height=\"683\" width=\"910\" charset=\"\">\n<figcaption>\n<p class=\"copyright\">Daniel Leal-Olivas/AFP via Getty Images</p>\n</figcaption>\n</figure></a></h3><h3><a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/edelman-takes-on-advertising-with-earned-creative-pitch-2020-10\">PR giant Edelman's CEO says the firm has recovered half its pandemic losses and lays out his plan to grow by taking on ad agencies and helping companies mend their reputations</a></h3><ul><li><a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/edelman-takes-on-advertising-with-earned-creative-pitch-2020-10\">Sean Czarnecki reports that Edelman CEO Richard Edelman said his PR firm has recovered half of its decline that stemmed from the pandemic through creative work for brands like Unilever that is traditionally done by ad agencies.</a></li><li>Edelman is also unfroze hiring and restored employee salaries to their amounts before the pandemic.</li><li>The company's US revenue, which makes up 60% of total revenue, slipped 10% year-over-year in the spring while other markets fell as much as 25% to 30% year-over-year.</li></ul></section><h3><a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/edelman-takes-on-advertising-with-earned-creative-pitch-2020-10\">Read the full story here.</a></h3><hr><section><h3><a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/hbo-max-marketing-strategy-free-trial-users-to-paying-customers-2020-10\"><figure>\n\t<img src=\"https://i.insider.com/5f8dadcbc21cfb0019468c46?format=jpeg\" alt=\"Selena Gomez Selena and Chef HBO Max.\" height=\"891\" width=\"1188\" charset=\"\">\n<figcaption>Selena Gomez stars in &#34;Selena and Chef,&#34; which was renewed for a second season on HBO Max.\n<p class=\"copyright\">HBO Max</p>\n</figcaption>\n</figure></a></h3><h3><a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/hbo-max-marketing-strategy-free-trial-users-to-paying-customers-2020-10\">How HBO Max's marketing team works to turn free-trial users into paying customers and prevent cancellations</a></h3><ul><li><a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/hbo-max-marketing-strategy-free-trial-users-to-paying-customers-2020-10\">Ashley Rodriguez looked at how WarnerMedia is promoting HBO Max with seven-day free trials in the crowded streaming space.</a></li><li>Christine Miller, director of campaign management for HBO Max, said that free-trial users who watch multiple shows and movies, and those who watch on more than one device, are the most likely to become paying subscribers. She uses push and email notifications to encourage people to open the app as soon as they register for a free trial.</li><li>The content of the messaging changes based on what people watch. Someone who watches Selena Gomez's cooking show \"Selena and Chef\" may get recommendations for other young-adult shows like \"Love Life\" or \"Friends.\" Someone who can't decide what to watch might get an email that shows different movies and series on the platform.</li></ul></section><h3><a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/edelman-takes-on-advertising-with-earned-creative-pitch-2020-10\"></a><a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/hbo-max-marketing-strategy-free-trial-users-to-paying-customers-2020-10\">Read the full story here.</a></h3><hr><section><h3><a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/0-4-percent-youtube-views-subscribers-monetization-2020-10\"><figure>\n\t<img src=\"https://i.insider.com/5f8db81e9e9fe4001900a19b?format=jpeg\" alt=\"pewdiepie\" height=\"2147\" width=\"2863\" charset=\"\">\n<figcaption>\n<p class=\"copyright\">Karwai Tang/WireImage</p>\n</figcaption>\n</figure></a></h3><h3><a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/0-4-percent-youtube-views-subscribers-monetization-2020-10\">Just 0.4% of channels on YouTube get the bulk of views and subscribers, a new study suggests</a></h3><ul><li><a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/0-4-percent-youtube-views-subscribers-monetization-2020-10\">A new study from researchers at the Universities of Amsterdam and Barcelona, as well as Queensland University of Technology in Australia underscores how hard it is for creators to make money from YouTube, reports Chris Stokel-Walker.</a></li><li>The researchers analyzed video views across 36.3 million YouTube channels, finding that only 4.4 million channels have more than 1,000 subscribers, making them eligible for running ads by YouTube. Another 153,770 channels — equivalent to 0.42% of the channels analyzed — have more than 100,000 subscribers.</li><li>\"All these YouTubers are driven to work across platforms,\" said Òscar Coromina, one of the study's authors. \"YouTube's monetization system isn't good enough to earn a living. Even these super-elite YouTubers need to go to other platforms like Patreon and Twitch.\"</li></ul></section><h3><a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/0-4-percent-youtube-views-subscribers-monetization-2020-10\">Read the full story here.</a></h3><hr><h3>More stories we're reading:</h3><ul><li data-trackable=\"header\"><a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/kevin-mayer-disney-tiktok-ceo-investor-moment-house-jared-leto-2020-10\">How Kevin Mayer, the ex-Disney executive who left to be TikTok's CEO for only 3 months, has started to mount a comeback as an investor</a> (Business Insider)</li><li data-trackable=\"header\"><a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/apple-music-videos-tv-livestream-mtv-2020-10\">Apple launched an MTV-style live-streaming channel featuring exclusive music videos and interviews</a> (Business Insider)</li><li data-trackable=\"header\"><a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/facebook-mark-zuckerberg-throttled-traffic-to-progressive-news-sites-wsj-2020-10\">Mark Zuckerberg reportedly signed off on a Facebook algorithm change that throttled traffic to progressive news sites — and one site says that quiet change cost them $400,00 to $600,000 a year</a> (Business Insider)<section></section></li><li data-trackable=\"header\"><a href=\"https://www.ft.com/content/836195c0-1d61-472c-bca0-f44f623d1fd7\">WPP back on hunt for deals, says chief</a> (Financial Times)</li><li data-trackable=\"header\"><a href=\"https://www.tubefilter.com/2020/10/19/tiktoks-music-hire-mary-rahmani-joins-triller-partnerships/\">TikTok's first music hire, Mary Rahmani, joins Triller as global head of partnerships</a>&#160;(TubeFilter)</li><li data-trackable=\"header\"><a href=\"https://www.wsj.com/articles/the-dodo-group-nines-animal-brand-is-getting-into-pet-insurance-11603101600\">The Dodo, Group Nine's animal brand, is getting into pet insurance</a> (Wall Street Journal)</li></ul><section><p>Thanks for reading and see you tomorrow! will do well with the <a href=\"https://casper.5ad6.net/c/196318/396851/7235?u=https%3A%2F%2Fcasper.com%2Fmattresses%2Fcasper-original%2F\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"nofollow noopener sponsored\">Casper Original</a> because of its average firmness, accessible price, and excellent motion isolation.</strong></li><li>Here's what to expect with each mattress so you can find the right one that fits your sleeping style and needs.&#160;</li><li><strong>For more buying advice, </strong><a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/best-mattress\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\"><strong>check out our guide to the best mattresses</strong></a><strong> and our reviews of the <a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/casper-element-mattress-review\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">Element</a>, <a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/casper-original-mattress-review\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">Original</a></strong><strong>, </strong><a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/casper-hybrid-mattress-review\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\"><strong>Original Hybrid</strong></a><strong>, </strong><a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/casper-nova-hybrid-mattress-review\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\"><strong>Nova Hybrid</strong></a><strong>, and <a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/casper-wave-hybrid-review\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">Wave Hybrid</a> mattresses.</strong></li></ul><p>Casper has revamped its entire line of mattresses. It updated the all-foam and hybrid versions of the <a href=\"https://casper.5ad6.net/c/196318/396851/7235?u=https%3A%2F%2Fcasper.com%2Fmattresses%2Fcasper-original%2F\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"nofollow noopener sponsored nofollow sponsored\">Original</a> and <a href=\"https://casper.5ad6.net/c/196318/396851/7235?u=https%3A%2F%2Fcasper.com%2Fmattresses%2Fcasper-wave%2F\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"nofollow noopener sponsored\">Wave</a>, and introduced the <a href=\"https://goto.target.com/c/196318/81938/2092?u=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.target.com%2Fp%2Fthe-casper-snug-mattress%2F-%2FA-77569864\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"nofollow noopener sponsored nofollow sponsored nofollow sponsored\">Snug</a>, cost-effective <a href=\"https://casper.5ad6.net/c/196318/396851/7235?u=https%3A%2F%2Fcasper.com%2Fmattresses%2Fcasper-element%2F\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"nofollow noopener sponsored\">Element</a>, and super-soft <a href=\"https://casper.5ad6.net/c/196318/396851/7235?u=https%3A%2F%2Fcasper.com%2Fmattresses%2Fcasper-nova%2F\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"nofollow noopener sponsored\">Nova</a>, which also comes as an <a href=\"https://zola.pxf.io/c/196318/584112/9631?u=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.zola.com%2Fshop%2Fproduct%2Fcasper1_nova_mattress%3FskuId%3D5e83691e4d7b981295ad8ca3\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"nofollow noopener sponsored nofollow sponsored\">all-foam</a> or hybrid. The Essential was dropped. The lineup now consists of eight mattresses — five are sold online at Casper and three (<a href=\"https://goto.target.com/c/196318/81938/2092?u=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.target.com%2Fp%2Fthe-casper-snug-mattress%2F-%2FA-77569864\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"nofollow noopener sponsored nofollow sponsored\">Snug</a>, <a href=\"https://go.skimresources.com?id=35871X943606&xs=1&url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.qvc.com%2FCasper-Wave-Full-Premium-Mattress.product.H219833.html%3FcolorId%3D000%26sizeId%3D000%26ref%3DGBA%26TZ%3DESTTZ%3DEST\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"nofollow noopener sponsored\">Wave</a> all-foam, and <a href=\"https://zola.pxf.io/c/196318/584112/9631?u=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.zola.com%2Fshop%2Fproduct%2Fcasper1_nova_mattress%3FskuId%3D5e83691e4d7b981295ad8ca3\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"nofollow noopener sponsored\">Nova</a> all-foam) are exclusive to retailers like <a href=\"https://goto.target.com/c/196318/81938/2092?u=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.target.com%2Fp%2Fthe-casper-snug-mattress%2F-%2FA-77569864\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"nofollow noopener sponsored\">Target</a>, <a href=\"https://zola.pxf.io/c/196318/584112/9631?u=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.zola.com%2Fshop%2Fproduct%2Fcasper1_nova_mattress%3FskuId%3D5e83691e4d7b981295ad8ca3\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"nofollow noopener sponsored\">Zola</a>, and <a href=\"https://go.skimresources.com?id=35871X943606&xs=1&url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.qvc.com%2FCasper-Wave-Full-Premium-Mattress.product.H219833.html%3FcolorId%3D000%26sizeId%3D000%26ref%3DGBA%26TZ%3DESTTZ%3DEST\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"nofollow noopener sponsored\">QVC</a>.&#160;</p><p>I tested the five that are sold online because that is what's most available and what is most appealing to shoppers, especially during the novel coronavirus pandemic if you're trying to limit exposure to stores. You can read the full reviews for the <a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/casper-original-mattress-review\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">Original</a>, <a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/casper-hybrid-mattress-review\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">Original Hybrid</a>, <a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/casper-nova-hybrid-mattress-review\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">Nova Hybrid</a>, <a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/casper-wave-hybrid-review\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">Wave Hybrid</a>, and <a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/casper-element-mattress-review\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">Element</a>, and our full comparison of what each mattress offers and what to expect below.</p><h2>Here are the mattresses we compared:</h2><div id=\"ProductCard_5e8cc8df0b3c9b58f10a41d3\" style=\"position:relative;
