height: 21px; text-align: center;\">Poor</td><td style=\"width: 10%; height: 21px; text-align: center;\">Poor</td></tr></tbody></table>\n<div id=\"slideshow\">\n\tCasper mattress price\n\t<figure>\n\t<img src=\"https://i.insider.com/5f36ea32e89ebf001f044d54?format=jpeg\" alt=\"Casper Elements\" height=\"742\" width=\"989\" charset=\"\">\n<figcaption>\n<p class=\"copyright\">Casper</p>\n</figcaption>\n</figure>\n\t<h3><strong>The </strong><a href=\"https://casper.5ad6.net/c/196318/396851/7235?u=https%3A%2F%2Fcasper.com%2Fmattresses%2Fcasper-element%2F\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"nofollow noopener sponsored\"><strong>Casper Element</strong></a><strong> is the least expensive mattress at $595 for a Queen and the <a href=\"https://casper.5ad6.net/c/196318/396851/7235?u=https%3A%2F%2Fcasper.com%2Fmattresses%2Fcasper-wave%2F\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"nofollow noopener sponsored\">Wave Hybrid</a> is the most at $2,595.</strong></h3><p>The most popular mattress size is the Queen, so we'll compare prices accordingly.&#160;</p><p>The budget-friendly Element is the least expensive and costs just $595 for the Queen. The all-foam <a href=\"https://casper.5ad6.net/c/196318/396851/7235?u=https%3A%2F%2Fcasper.com%2Fmattresses%2Fcasper-original%2F\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"nofollow noopener sponsored nofollow sponsored\">Original</a> is $1,095, and $1,295 for the <a href=\"https://casper.5ad6.net/c/196318/396851/7235?u=https%3A%2F%2Fcasper.com%2Fmattresses%2Fcasper-original%2F%3Fmaterial%3Dhybrid\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"nofollow noopener sponsored\">Hybrid</a>. The super-soft <a href=\"https://casper.5ad6.net/c/196318/396851/7235?u=https%3A%2F%2Fcasper.com%2Fmattresses%2Fcasper-nova%2F\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"nofollow noopener sponsored\">Nova Hybrid</a> will cost you $1,995 for a Queen, and the Wave Hybrid is even more expensive at $2,595.</p><p>Since you will be using the same mattress for a decade or more and your quality of life is drastically influenced by your sleep quality, price should not be the only consideration when buying a bed. It's a big factor, yes, but price differences work out to only a few cents a day over the lifetime of a mattress so it's a worthy investment in our opinion.</p><p>Casper also has monthly payment plans with low interest rates, though we never recommend going into debt for any purchase.</p>\n\tMattress thickness\n\t\n\t<h3><strong>Because of its low price, the <a href=\"https://casper.5ad6.net/c/196318/396851/7235?u=https%3A%2F%2Fcasper.com%2Fmattresses%2Fcasper-element%2F\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"nofollow noopener sponsored\">Element</a> also has the most basic construction and is the thinnest at 10 inches. The <a href=\"https://casper.5ad6.net/c/196318/396851/7235?u=https%3A%2F%2Fcasper.com%2Fmattresses%2Fcasper-wave%2F\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"nofollow noopener sponsored\">Wave Hybrid</a> is the thickest at 13 inches.</strong></h3><p>When it comes to construction, the Casper mattresses get more complex and feature more layers as you go up in price. Here's what you need to know:</p><ul><li><strong><a href=\"https://casper.5ad6.net/c/196318/396851/7235?u=https%3A%2F%2Fcasper.com%2Fmattresses%2Fcasper-original%2F\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"nofollow noopener sponsored\">Original</a></strong> &#8212; 11 inches thick. There are three foam layers: perforated breathable foam on top for increased airflow, a middle layer with zoned support meant to align your spine and provide pressure relief, and a supportive base.</li><li><strong><a href=\"https://casper.5ad6.net/c/196318/396851/7235?u=https%3A%2F%2Fcasper.com%2Fmattresses%2Fcasper-original%2F%3Fmaterial%3Dhybrid\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"nofollow noopener sponsored\">Original Hybrid</a> </strong>&#8212; 11 inches thick. This mattress has the same construction as the Original but with the addition of innersprings in the base to improve support, airflow, and lift.</li><li><a href=\"https://casper.5ad6.net/c/196318/396851/7235?u=https%3A%2F%2Fcasper.com%2Fmattresses%2Fcasper-nova%2F\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"nofollow noopener sponsored\"><strong>Nova Hybrid</strong></a> &#8212; 12 inches thick. There are individually-wrapped springs plus four foam layers &#8212; breathable and perforated foam makes up the top two with support zones for spine alignment and pressure relief in the second; additional zoned support in the third layer to relieve pressure under the lower back, waist, and hips; and firm edge support around the springs in the base.&#160;</li><li><strong><a href=\"https://casper.5ad6.net/c/196318/396851/7235?u=https%3A%2F%2Fcasper.com%2Fmattresses%2Fcasper-wave%2F\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"nofollow noopener sponsored\">Wave Hybrid</a> &#8212;</strong> 13 inches thick. There are individually-wrapped coils plus five foam layers: three layers of breathable foam, including a top layer with a cooling gel coating; a perforated second layer built for airflow; a zoned support third layer; a layer of cooling gel pods, and a supportive base.</li><li><strong><a href=\"https://casper.5ad6.net/c/196318/396851/7235?u=https%3A%2F%2Fcasper.com%2Fmattresses%2Fcasper-element%2F\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"nofollow noopener sponsored\">Element</a></strong> &#8212; 10 inches thick. There are two foam layers: a top layer of perforated breathable foam for increased airflow and pressure relief and a durable, supportive bottom layer.</li></ul>\n\tSet-up process\n\t<figure>\n\t<img src=\"https://i.insider.com/5f36e84de89ebf001f044d34?format=jpeg\" alt=\"Casper Element Mattress\" height=\"857\" width=\"1142\" charset=\"\">\n<figcaption>\n<p class=\"copyright\">Casper</p>\n</figcaption>\n</figure>\n\t<h3><strong>Thanks to its firmess level and light weight, </strong><a href=\"https://casper.5ad6.net/c/196318/396851/7235?u=https%3A%2F%2Fcasper.com%2Fmattresses%2Fcasper-element%2F\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"nofollow noopener sponsored\"><strong>the Element</strong></a><strong> is the easiest to move around and set up. The <a href=\"https://casper.5ad6.net/c/196318/396851/7235?u=https%3A%2F%2Fcasper.com%2Fmattresses%2Fcasper-nova%2F\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"nofollow noopener sponsored\">Nova Hybrid</a> and <a href=\"https://casper.5ad6.net/c/196318/396851/7235?u=https%3A%2F%2Fcasper.com%2Fmattresses%2Fcasper-wave%2F\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"nofollow noopener sponsored\">Wave Hybrid</a> are the heaviest and come with handles to help make moving easier.</strong></h3><p>Before we get into the nitty-gritty of set-up, it's worth pointing out that during normal times, Casper offers in-home set-up. This service usually costs about $149 and the delivery team will unbox your mattress wherever you want, take the old packaging with them, and remove your old bed too. Unfortunately, this service has been suspended during the coronavirus pandemic.</p><p>I unboxed all of the mattresses by myself, but I'm an old pro. I recommend having a partner or friend help you since there's heavy lifting involved. Each bed came with instructions and took about five minutes to completely unpackage and place on my test bed frame, the <a href=\"https://www.amazon.com/gp/product/B07D7HBR76/ref=as_li_tl?ie=UTF8&#38;tag=biipf_062520_casper-nova-hybrid-mattress-review-20&#38;camp=1789&#38;creative=9325&#38;linkCode=as2&#38;creativeASIN=B07D7HBR76&#38;linkId=e46da97859d9449f07d5168429bcd080\">Zinus Callie</a>, though you can use the Casper mattresses on any strong and level foundation.</p><p>The set up was simple. I emptied the mattress out of the box onto my bed frame, unwrapped the outer layer of plastic, unfolded the mattress so it was flat on the frame, and then removed the inner layer of plastic.</p><p>Each mattress gave off a \"new bed smell\" once released from the vacuum seal. This is why I always unbox mattresses in the morning &#8212; it gives them time to air out before I put sheets on them at bedtime. A full day of airing out is needed to be odor-free.</p><p>Though there weren't any major differences in the set-up processes, there were a few minor variations with each mattress. The weight of a mattress is a big determinant in how easy it is to set-up and how difficult it will be to move and rotate down the road.</p><p>The Element is the lightest at 68 pounds for a Queen, the Original is 79, the Original Hybrid is 91, the Nova Hybrid is 89, and the Wave Hybrid is a back-breaking 111 pounds.</p><p>However, weight isn't the only factor in the set-up process. The Nova Hybrid and Wave Hybrid have two handles sewn onto the left and right sides of the bed, which made them easier to move and position. But the handles weren't enough to make up for the heft and floppiness of the Wave Hybrid.</p><p>The Nova Hybrid unfolded upside down after you remove the outer layer of plastic so you have to flip it. This was not an issue with the other mattresses, so hopefully it was a fluke, but something to note in case you experience a similar issue.</p>\n\tFirmness level\n\t<figure>\n\t<img src=\"https://i.insider.com/5f36e885e89ebf001f044d39?format=jpeg\" alt=\"Casper Nova\" height=\"680\" width=\"907\" charset=\"\">\n<figcaption>\n<p class=\"copyright\">Casper</p>\n</figcaption>\n</figure>\n\t<h3><strong>Though I personally prefer the plush </strong><a href=\"https://casper.5ad6.net/c/196318/396851/7235?u=https%3A%2F%2Fcasper.com%2Fmattresses%2Fcasper-nova%2F\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"nofollow noopener sponsored\"><strong>Nova Hybrid</strong></a><strong>, the </strong><a href=\"https://casper.5ad6.net/c/196318/396851/7235?u=https%3A%2F%2Fcasper.com%2Fmattresses%2Fcasper-original%2F\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"nofollow noopener sponsored\"><strong>Original</strong></a><strong> would appeal to a broader range of sleepers with its slightly firmer than average feel.</strong></h3><p>Firmness is the most important factor when comparing mattresses because it often translates to comfort.</p><p>From softest to firmest, the mattresses rank Nova Hybrid, <a href=\"https://casper.5ad6.net/c/196318/396851/7235?u=https%3A%2F%2Fcasper.com%2Fmattresses%2Fcasper-original%2F%3Fmaterial%3Dhybrid\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"nofollow noopener sponsored\">Original Hybrid</a>, <a href=\"https://casper.5ad6.net/c/196318/396851/7235?u=https%3A%2F%2Fcasper.com%2Fmattresses%2Fcasper-wave%2F\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"nofollow noopener sponsored\">Wave Hybrid</a>, Original, and <a href=\"https://casper.5ad6.net/c/196318/396851/7235?u=https%3A%2F%2Fcasper.com%2Fmattresses%2Fcasper-element%2F\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"nofollow noopener sponsored\">Element</a>. The <a href=\"https://casper.5ad6.net/c/196318/396851/7235?u=https%3A%2F%2Fcasper.com%2Fmattresses%2Fcasper-nova%2F\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"nofollow noopener sponsored\">Nova Hybrid</a> is significantly soft, while the other mattresses are all close to average. The Original Hybrid and Wave Hybrid are average, while the Original and Element are slightly firmer than average. According to Casper, the Element is a medium firmness but in my experience, I thought it was the firmest of the bunch.</p><p>Comfort is an incredibly subjective characteristic of mattresses since it depends on several factors that vary by person. Softer mattresses are usually ideal for side sleepers and lighter individuals because it's better at contouring around your body, while&#160;firmer beds most often benefit stomach and back sleepers, and heavier people.</p><p>When I first started testing mattresses, I preferred slightly firmer than average mattresses, especially since I suffer from chronic back pain. But I recently lost a lot of weight and softer mattresses are preferable to me now. For reference, I'm 6-feet tall, weigh 195 pounds, and prefer to sleep on my side, though you'll occasionally catch me on my stomach.</p><p>I'm giving you my life story to illustrate that you should take my comfort assessments with a grain of salt.</p>\n\tHeat dissipation\n\t\n\t<h3>During our testing, the <a href=\"https://casper.5ad6.net/c/196318/396851/7235?u=https%3A%2F%2Fcasper.com%2Fmattresses%2Fcasper-nova%2F\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"nofollow noopener sponsored\">Nova Hybrid</a> and <a href=\"https://casper.5ad6.net/c/196318/396851/7235?u=https%3A%2F%2Fcasper.com%2Fmattresses%2Fcasper-original%2F\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"nofollow noopener sponsored\">Original</a> were the most breathable and the <a href=\"https://casper.5ad6.net/c/196318/396851/7235?u=https%3A%2F%2Fcasper.com%2Fmattresses%2Fcasper-wave%2F\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"nofollow noopener sponsored\">Wave Hybrid</a> was the least.</h3><p>In addition to firmness, heat dissipation is important. I'm a hot sleeper and none of the mattresses caused me to overheat. They all seem to have decent airflow. However, I found the <a href=\"https://casper.5ad6.net/c/196318/396851/7235?u=https%3A%2F%2Fcasper.com%2Fmattresses%2Fcasper-nova%2F\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"nofollow noopener sponsored\">Nova Hybrid</a> and <a href=\"https://casper.5ad6.net/c/196318/396851/7235?u=https%3A%2F%2Fcasper.com%2Fmattresses%2Fcasper-original%2F\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"nofollow noopener sponsored\">Original</a> did the best in this department. They both kept me cool all night long.</p><p>The <a href=\"https://casper.5ad6.net/c/196318/396851/7235?u=https%3A%2F%2Fcasper.com%2Fmattresses%2Fcasper-original%2F%3Fmaterial%3Dhybrid\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"nofollow noopener sponsored\">Original Hybrid</a> did an okay job of removing heat. I didn't feel particularly cool or hot during testing, but after returning from middle-of-the-night bathroom trips, I could still feel some trapped body heat. This is in contrast with the previous version of the Hybrid, which did a better job of dissipating heat.</p><p>The <a href=\"https://casper.5ad6.net/c/196318/396851/7235?u=https%3A%2F%2Fcasper.com%2Fmattresses%2Fcasper-element%2F\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"nofollow noopener sponsored\">Element's</a> heat dissipation was subpar, though not nearly as bad as the <a href=\"https://casper.5ad6.net/c/196318/396851/7235?u=https%3A%2F%2Fcasper.com%2Fmattresses%2Fcasper-wave%2F\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"nofollow noopener sponsored\">Wave Hybrid</a> &#8212; it slept the hottest of the mattresses.</p>\n\tEdge support\n\t<figure>\n\t<img src=\"https://i.insider.com/5f36e8f0e89ebf001f044d3c?format=jpeg\" alt=\"Casper Original\" height=\"692\" width=\"923\" charset=\"\">\n<figcaption>\n<p class=\"copyright\">Casper</p>\n</figcaption>\n</figure>\n\t<h3><strong>The </strong><a href=\"https://casper.5ad6.net/c/196318/396851/7235?u=https%3A%2F%2Fcasper.com%2Fmattresses%2Fcasper-original%2F%3Fmaterial%3Dhybrid\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"nofollow noopener sponsored\"><strong>Original Hybrid</strong></a><strong> has the best edge support of all five mattresses, and the </strong><a href=\"https://casper.5ad6.net/c/196318/396851/7235?u=https%3A%2F%2Fcasper.com%2Fmattresses%2Fcasper-element%2F\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"nofollow noopener sponsored\"><strong>Element</strong></a><strong> and the </strong><a href=\"https://casper.5ad6.net/c/196318/396851/7235?u=https%3A%2F%2Fcasper.com%2Fmattresses%2Fcasper-nova%2F\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"nofollow noopener sponsored\"><strong>Nova Hybrid</strong></a><strong> also performed well in our tests.</strong></h3><p>If you share a bed with someone, there might be times when you're too close for comfort on the edge. If a bed has poor edge support, you might feel like you're going to fall off, which will affect your sleep. And whether you're transitioning to standing from laying down or putting on your socks and shoes in the morning, it's nice to be able to sit on the bed's edge without it sagging too much.</p><p>The <a href=\"https://casper.5ad6.net/c/196318/396851/7235?u=https%3A%2F%2Fcasper.com%2Fmattresses%2Fcasper-original%2F%3Fmaterial%3Dhybrid\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"nofollow noopener sponsored\">Original Hybrid</a> has the best edge support. I could lay on the edge all day and not feel uncomfortable. And when I sat on the edge, it didn't sink much at all. The <a href=\"https://casper.5ad6.net/c/196318/396851/7235?u=https%3A%2F%2Fcasper.com%2Fmattresses%2Fcasper-element%2F\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"nofollow noopener sponsored\">Element</a> had the second-best edge support, and the <a href=\"https://casper.5ad6.net/c/196318/396851/7235?u=https%3A%2F%2Fcasper.com%2Fmattresses%2Fcasper-nova%2F\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"nofollow noopener sponsored\">Nova Hybrid</a> was also good. When my wife tried to annex the bed by crowding my side, I didn't feel uncomfortable sidling up to the outer margins of these mattresses.&#160;</p><p>The experience was different with the <a href=\"https://casper.5ad6.net/c/196318/396851/7235?u=https%3A%2F%2Fcasper.com%2Fmattresses%2Fcasper-wave%2F\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"nofollow noopener sponsored\">Wave Hybrid</a> and <a href=\"https://casper.5ad6.net/c/196318/396851/7235?u=https%3A%2F%2Fcasper.com%2Fmattresses%2Fcasper-original%2F\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"nofollow noopener sponsored\">Casper Original</a>. Both of these models have subpar edge support, though the Wave Hybrid was clearly the worst. I was surprised by how much the sides sagged when I sat on them, and when I laid near the edge, I felt like rolling off. The Original wasn't horrible, but I did fall off fairly easily when on the edge and there was clear sagging.</p>\n\tMotion transfer\n\t<figure>\n\t<img src=\"https://i.insider.com/5f36e927e89ebf001f044d41?format=jpeg\" alt=\"Casper Element Mattress\" height=\"725\" width=\"966\" charset=\"\">\n<figcaption>\n<p class=\"copyright\">Casper</p>\n</figcaption>\n</figure>\n\t<h3><strong>The </strong><a href=\"https://casper.5ad6.net/c/196318/396851/7235?u=https%3A%2F%2Fcasper.com%2Fmattresses%2Fcasper-element%2F\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"nofollow noopener sponsored\"><strong>Casper Element</strong></a><strong> has the best motion isolation, and the </strong><a href=\"https://casper.5ad6.net/c/196318/396851/7235?u=https%3A%2F%2Fcasper.com%2Fmattresses%2Fcasper-original%2F\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"nofollow noopener sponsored\"><strong>Casper Original</strong></a><strong> also received high scores in our motion transfer tests.</strong></h3><p>If you sleep with a partner or pet, motion isolation is going to be one of the most important characteristics to consider when choosing a mattress. If your partner is tossing and turning in the night, you don't want their movements to disturb your sleep.&#160;&#160;</p><p>I've created a motion transfer test based on research and the materials I have available. I start by placing a 12-ounce can of soda upright in the middle of the bed. Then I drop a 15-pound bowling ball from 4 feet above the bed so that its impact point is about 12 inches from the can. It's a good indication that the mattress has good motion isolation if the can stays upright after performing the test over and over. On the other hand, if the can consistently falls over, the motion dampening property isn't very good.</p><p>In my tests, only the <a href=\"https://casper.5ad6.net/c/196318/396851/7235?u=https%3A%2F%2Fcasper.com%2Fmattresses%2Fcasper-original%2F\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"nofollow noopener sponsored\">Casper Original</a> and <a href=\"https://casper.5ad6.net/c/196318/396851/7235?u=https%3A%2F%2Fcasper.com%2Fmattresses%2Fcasper-element%2F\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"nofollow noopener sponsored\">Element</a> had solid motion isolation. The can stayed upright after each initial drop. With the Casper Original, the can would shift to one side slightly after one drop, and when I dropped the bowling ball a second time without repositioning the can, it fell over. With the Element, I didn't need to readjust the can. I just dropped the bowling ball again and again, and the can stayed upright.</p><p>When I performed the test on the <a href=\"https://casper.5ad6.net/c/196318/396851/7235?u=https%3A%2F%2Fcasper.com%2Fmattresses%2Fcasper-wave%2F\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"nofollow noopener sponsored\">Wave Hybrid</a>, the can fell over immediately in some areas but not others. This is likely due to the different support zones built into the mattress, so I'd say this is good but not great.</p><p>Both the <a href=\"https://casper.5ad6.net/c/196318/396851/7235?u=https%3A%2F%2Fcasper.com%2Fmattresses%2Fcasper-original%2F%3Fmaterial%3Dhybrid\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"nofollow noopener sponsored\">Original Hybrid</a> and <a href=\"https://casper.5ad6.net/c/196318/396851/7235?u=https%3A%2F%2Fcasper.com%2Fmattresses%2Fcasper-nova%2F\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"nofollow noopener sponsored\">Nova Hybrid</a> failed the motion transfer tests even when I moved the impact point of the bowling ball to 18 inches from the can.&#160;&#160;</p><p>My motion transfer tests were backed up by my personal, subjective experience. I could clearly feel the movements of my wife and dog in the hybrid beds but their movements were less pronounced when we shared the all-foam Casper mattresses.</p><p>These results suggest that the all-foam beds might be better for couples sharing a bed, while the hybrid mattresses might be better suited for people who sleep alone, or heavy sleepers who wouldn't even feel any motion. If you get a larger hybrid mattress size, it might be fine for couples.</p>\n\tMattress sizes available\n\t\n\t<h3>All five mattresses are available in Twin, Twin XL, Full, Queen, King, and Cal King sizes.</h3><p>Those first three sizes are best for people who sleep alone with Twin XL being ideal for taller individuals and Full beds geared toward bigger folks. The other sizes will better suit couples who share a bed. Cal King is for taller partners, and King is for those who are larger.</p><p>To ensure a more objective review, I always test Queen-sized mattresses as it's the most popular size and fits a large group of sleepers. However, my wife and I are a little larger than your average humans and we share a bed with a terrier and a bulky full-body pillow. If I wasn't testing a mattress for work, we would need a King or Cal King instead.</p>\n\tReturn policy and warranty\n\t<figure>\n\t<img src=\"https://i.insider.com/5f36c67ae89ebf001f044b12?format=jpeg\" alt=\"Casper Warranty\" height=\"585\" width=\"780\" charset=\"\">\n<figcaption>\n<p class=\"copyright\">Casper</p>\n</figcaption>\n</figure>\n\t<h3><strong>Casper has a 100-night risk-free trial and 10-year limited warranty.</strong></h3><p>A good return policy is a must when trying out a mattress since the only way you can know if a bed is right for you is to actually sleep on it.&#160;&#160;</p><p>You can try any of the mattresses with Casper's 100-night risk-free trial. Within that time, if you decide you don't like it, just let the company know and it will work with a local recycling center or charity to haul it away for you. You will then receive a full refund within 14 days without any extra shipping charges. There is only one 100-night trial per mattress per customer.</p><p>We advise against taking advantage of the generous policy since it can lead to waste &#8212; mattresses that aren't recycled usually wind up in landfills.&#160;</p><p>Each mattress is backed by a 10-year limited warranty. Casper will replace or fix your mattress if you find it has a significant indentation of an inch or more, physical flaws, or manufacturing defects. But you need to make sure you use the bed normally, care for it properly, and utilize a supportive foundation or frame, otherwise the warranty is void.&#160;</p>\n\tBrick and mortar locations\n\t\n\t<p>The company has showrooms across the country and is available in select Target stores so you can see firsthand what's available before <a href=\"https://casper.5ad6.net/c/196318/396851/7235?u=https%3A%2F%2Fcasper.com%2F\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"nofollow noopener sponsored nofollow sponsored\">ordering online</a> for delivery to your front door. We suggest calling your local Casper or Target store for updated operating hours and procedures due to the novel coronavirus.&#160;</p>\n\tAppearance\n\t\n\t<p>The mattresses have similar appearances. They all have a gray border with the name of the mattress at the foot of the bed.</p><p>The updated mattresses are all made from high-quality, eco-friendly materials, including <a href=\"https://certipur.us/about-the-seal/\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">CertiPUR-US-certified foams</a> and recycled plastic bottles. The covers of each are made in part from eco-friendly recycled bottles. All but the Element have quilted mattress tops.</p>\n\tThe bottom line\n\t<figure>\n\t<img src=\"https://i.insider.com/5f36e9f7e89ebf001f044d51?format=jpeg\" alt=\"Casper Original Mattress\" height=\"776\" width=\"1035\" charset=\"\">\n<figcaption>\n<p class=\"copyright\">Casper</p>\n</figcaption>\n</figure>\n\t<h3><strong>I'm a personal fan of the </strong><strong><a href=\"https://casper.5ad6.net/c/196318/396851/7235?u=https%3A%2F%2Fcasper.com%2Fmattresses%2Fcasper-nova%2F\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"nofollow noopener sponsored\">Nova Hybrid</a> for the soft feel, breathability, and excellent edge support, but</strong><strong> the </strong><a href=\"https://casper.5ad6.net/c/196318/396851/7235?u=https%3A%2F%2Fcasper.com%2Fmattresses%2Fcasper-original%2F%3Fmaterial%3Dhybrid\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"nofollow noopener sponsored\"><strong>Casper Original</strong></a><strong> is the overall better mattress. It performed almost as well as the Nova Hybrid in our tests but</strong><strong> the firmness accommodates more sleeping styles and it's about half the price.</strong></h3><p>While I was testing the new Casper mattresses, the one I most enjoyed sleeping on was the <a href=\"https://casper.5ad6.net/c/196318/396851/7235?u=https%3A%2F%2Fcasper.com%2Fmattresses%2Fcasper-nova%2F\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"nofollow noopener sponsored\">Nova Hybrid</a>. It excelled in two important categories &#8212; edge support and comfort. But naturally, comfort is subjective. I'm a hot sleeper who prefers softer mattresses, and the Nova Hybrid slept the coolest and is the softest of the lot, which made it the most comfortable for me.</p><p>I think most sleepers will benefit from the <a href=\"https://casper.5ad6.net/c/196318/396851/7235?u=https%3A%2F%2Fcasper.com%2Fmattresses%2Fcasper-original%2F\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"nofollow noopener sponsored\">Casper Original</a>, which, with its slightly firmer than average feel, was comfortable when I slept on my side and stomach, and my wife was comfortable on her back. This accommodated more sleeping styles. The bed stayed nice and cool through the night, had good motion isolation, and was easy to move. The edge support is subpar, but at almost half the price of the Nova Hybrid, it's overall a solid value.</p><p>For couples on a smaller budget, I recommend turning to the <a href=\"https://casper.5ad6.net/c/196318/396851/7235?u=https%3A%2F%2Fcasper.com%2Fmattresses%2Fcasper-element%2F\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"nofollow noopener sponsored\">Element</a>. It's about $500 cheaper than the other beds, and the only mattress that has both excellent edge support and motion isolation. If you are picky about comfort, though, you may want to look elsewhere because the simple two-layer construction of the Element doesn't afford much pressure relief.</p><p>The <a href=\"https://casper.5ad6.net/c/196318/396851/7235?u=https%3A%2F%2Fcasper.com%2Fmattresses%2Fcasper-original%2F%3Fmaterial%3Dhybrid\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"nofollow noopener sponsored\">Original Hybrid</a> is a good solution for a broad array of sleepers with its medium firmness. I'm usually a side-sleeper, but I preferred to sleep on my stomach while testing it. It doesn't sleep too hot either.</p><p>The only mattress I'm hesitant to recommend is the pricy <a href=\"https://casper.5ad6.net/c/196318/396851/7235?u=https%3A%2F%2Fcasper.com%2Fmattresses%2Fcasper-wave%2F\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"nofollow noopener sponsored\">Wave Hybrid</a>. Since the motion isolation, edge support, and heat dissipation are subpar, I could only see this as a possible adequate solution for stomach or back sleepers who sleep cold and alone and have the money to spend on a luxury mattress &#8212; but it's a stretch.&#160;</p>\n</div><div class=\"read-original\">Read the original article on <a href='https://www.businessinsider.com/casper-mattress-review'>Business Insider</a></div><div class=\"feedflare\">\n<a border=\"0\"></img></a> <a href=\"http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/businessinsider?a=7IzltMt4rdc:BxtRrm6NhnY:V_sGLiPBpWU\"><img +0000","feedId":22,"bgimg":"https://i.insider.com/5f36ee2ee89ebf001f044dba?format=jpeg","linkMd5":"005c1eeda0c606497199d77711b8cda5","bgimgJsdelivr":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx13/cdn74@2020_2/2020/10/20/02-05-12-985_16bef4c0e4dc3ac0.webp","destWidth":1891,"destHeight":1418,"sourceBytes":145548,"destBytes":145548,"author":"jamesbrains55@gmail.com (James Brains)","articleImgCdnMap":{"https://i.insider.com/5f2da6c6988ee332292b2f4c?format=jpeg":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx32/cdn53@2020_1/2020/10/20/02-05-12-893_0309297a3da8e895.webp","https://i.insider.com/5f36ea32e89ebf001f044d54?format=jpeg":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx31/cdn79@2020_6/2020/10/20/02-05-24-410_52483925a49335d4.webp","https://i.insider.com/5f36e84de89ebf001f044d34?format=jpeg":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx23/cdn32@2020_4/2020/10/20/02-05-18-284_cf4e9f2e32e9afd2.webp","https://i.insider.com/5f36e885e89ebf001f044d39?format=jpeg":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx8/cdn60@2020_5/2020/10/20/02-05-18-464_127e4a317f6de939.webp","https://i.insider.com/5f36e8f0e89ebf001f044d3c?format=jpeg":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx24/cdn60@2020_3/2020/10/20/02-05-22-848_1d2b8a2b30831ade.webp","https://i.insider.com/5f36e927e89ebf001f044d41?format=jpeg":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx24/cdn72@2020_4/2020/10/20/02-05-23-545_084ec644b6ccc80c.webp","https://i.insider.com/5f36c67ae89ebf001f044b12?format=jpeg":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx12/cdn12@2020_1/2020/10/20/02-05-17-219_c0ebef7c43ff2713.webp","https://i.insider.com/5f36e9f7e89ebf001f044d51?format=jpeg":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx5oss/cdn83@2020_3/2020/10/20/02-05-22-000_d1fbac901fa6b297.webp","http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/businessinsider?d=yIl2AUoC8zA":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx15/cdn67@2020_3/2020/10/20/02-05-22-757_cc3ef43fc8ff5801.webp","http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/businessinsider?i=7IzltMt4rdc:BxtRrm6NhnY:F7zBnMyn0Lo":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx29/cdn27@2020_6/2020/10/20/02-05-23-220_ee7e1330edc5b35c.webp","http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/businessinsider?i=7IzltMt4rdc:BxtRrm6NhnY:V_sGLiPBpWU":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx3/cdn79@2020_3/2020/10/20/02-05-21-262_29529bd341edfd2c.webp","http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/businessinsider?d=qj6IDK7rITs":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx30/cdn79@2020_1/2020/10/20/02-05-18-571_740defb435ea442b.webp","http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/businessinsider?i=7IzltMt4rdc:BxtRrm6NhnY:gIN9vFwOqvQ":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx14/cdn63@2020_5/2020/10/20/02-05-17-975_7748675e74bb36ce.webp","http://feeds.feedburner.com/~r/businessinsider/~4/7IzltMt4rdc":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx31/cdn67@2020_2/2020/10/20/02-05-23-490_c5e2ba49ad96dec5.webp"},"publishedOrCreatedDate":1603159473327},{"createdTime":"2020-10-20 10:04:33","updatedTime":"2020-10-20 10:04:33","title":"United Airlines just announced 8 new leisure routes in another shift away from business travel following heavy losses – here's the full list","link":"https://www.businessinsider.com/united-airlines-adds-8-lesiure-routes-to-latin-america-caribbean-2020-10","description":"<figure>\n\t<img src=\"https://i.insider.com/5f8dd16c9e9fe4001900a260?format=jpeg\" alt=\"United Airlines 777\" height=\"2981\" width=\"3975\" charset=\"\">\n<figcaption>A United Airlines Boeing 777.\n<p class=\"copyright\">Nicolas Economou/NurPhoto/Getty</p>\n</figcaption>\n</figure><ul class=\"summary-list\">\n<li>United Airlines is growing its leisure route network as executives expect business travel to remain low until 2024.</li>\n<li>Latin American and Caribbean countries with limited or no restrictions for entry by US citizens are the main focus of the expansion.</li>\n<li>The new routes boost United's presence in Mexico, Costa Rica, Belize, the Dominican Republic, and Honduras.</li>\n<li><a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/?hprecirc-bullet\">Visit Business Insider's homepage for more stories</a>.</li>\n</ul><p>United Airlines is further <a href=\"https://hub.united.com/2020-10-16-united-airlines-announces-eight-new-routes-and-increases-flights-to-19-destinations-in-the-caribbean-central-america-and-mexico-for-winter-sun-seekers-2648228755.html\">expanding its leisure route map</a> this winter with a focus on Latin America and the Caribbean as demand shifts south of the border to the few countries welcoming Americans. The new leisure-focused routes make sense as the company's CEO has said he doesn't expect business travel to recover until 2024.&#160;</p><p>The new routes boost United's presence in Mexico, Costa Rica, Belize, the Dominican Republic, and Honduras with expanded service from the airline's hubs across the US from coast to coast. Both regions have been taking the lead in accepting American tourists in recent months as more flyers take to the skies.</p><p>Costa Rica, for example, is opening its borders to all Americans starting November 1 – after previously restricting entry for residents of high-risk states – with proof of a negative COVID-19 PCR test, according to the <a href=\"https://cr.usembassy.gov/covid-19-information/\">US Embassy in San Jose</a>. Belize and Honduras have recently begun allowing all US citizens to enter but are similarly requiring negative tests to be presented for entry.&#160;</p><p>Mexico has remained open to Americans arriving via air throughout the summer and has not used negative tests as a requirement for entry. The Dominican Republic also does not require a negative test for entry.</p><p>The new routes allow for quicker journeys and allow for more non-stop itineraries for those seeking to head south for the winter. United is also increasing flights on existing routes to Latin America and the Caribbean.&#160;</p><p>Here's where United Airlines is flying this winter.</p><h2>Between Cleveland, Ohio, and Cancun, Mexico</h2><figure>\n\t<img src=\"https://i.insider.com/5f5a3ab1e6ff30001d4e7ff8?format=jpeg\" alt=\"Cancun, Mexico\" height=\"1403\" width=\"1872\" charset=\"\">\n<figcaption>Cancun, Mexico.\n<p class=\"copyright\">Shutterstock.com</p>\n</figcaption>\n</figure><p>United will begin flying between Cleveland, Ohio, and Cancun, Mexico on December 19 with year-round, Saturday-only service after having left the route in August 2019, according to Cirium route data. Competing with United on the route will be ultra-low-cost carriers Frontier Airlines and Spirit Airlines.</p><p>A former United hub that was re-acquired by the airline after a merger with Continental Airlines, Cleveland has seen reductions in service from United in recent years, with few routes beyond those to its other hubs. Once the route resumes, it will be United's only international route from Cleveland.&#160;</p><h2>Between Washington, DC and Santo Domingo, Dominican Republic</h2><figure>\n\t<img src=\"https://i.insider.com/5f8deabb9e9fe4001900a2fd?format=jpeg\" alt=\"Santo Domingo Dominican Republic\" height=\"1660\" width=\"2214\" charset=\"\">\n<figcaption>Santo Domingo, Dominican Republic.\n<p class=\"copyright\">Roldys Jorge/Shutterstock.com</p>\n</figcaption>\n</figure><p>United will begin flying between Washington, DC, and Santo Domingo, Dominican Republic on December 17 with daily service until March 27, according to Cirium route data. No other airlines currently serve this route.&#160;</p><h2>Between Denver and San Jose, Costa Rica</h2><figure>\n\t<img src=\"https://i.insider.com/5f8ddc5d9e9fe4001900a2a7?format=jpeg\" alt=\"San Jose, Costa Rica\" height=\"1405\" width=\"1874\" charset=\"\">\n<figcaption>San Jose, Costa Rica.\n<p class=\"copyright\">Shutterstock.com</p>\n</figcaption>\n</figure><p>United will begin flying between Denver and San Jose, Costa Rica on December 19 with Saturday-only service until March 27, according to Cirium route data. No other airline currently serves the route.</p><h2>Between Denver and Belize City, Belize&#160;</h2><figure>\n\t<img src=\"https://i.insider.com/5f8dde889e9fe4001900a2bb?format=jpeg\" alt=\"Belize City Belize\" height=\"1874\" width=\"2498\" charset=\"\">\n<figcaption>Belize City, Belize.\n<p class=\"copyright\">Shutterstock.com</p>\n</figcaption>\n</figure><p>United will begin flying between Denver and Belize City, Belize on December 19 with Saturday-only service until March 27, according to Cirium route data. No other airline currently serves the route.</p><h2>Between Los Angeles and San Jose, Costa Rica</h2><figure>\n\t<img src=\"https://i.insider.com/5f8dde8fc21cfb0019468d8f?format=jpeg\" alt=\"San Jose Costa Rica\" height=\"1666\" width=\"2223\" charset=\"\">\n<figcaption>San Jose, Costa Rica.\n<p class=\"copyright\">Mihai Bogdan Lazar : Shutterstock.com</p>\n</figcaption>\n</figure><p>United will begin flying between Los Angeles and San Jose, Costa Rica on December 19 with Saturday-only service, eventually becoming daily service on January 5. Competing with United on the route will be Alaska Airlines, JetBlue Airways, and Delta Air Lines.&#160;</p><h2>Between Los Angeles and San Pedro Sula, Honduras</h2><figure>\n\t<img src=\"https://i.insider.com/5f8dde83c21cfb0019468d8e?format=jpeg\" alt=\"San Pedro Sula Honduras\" height=\"1874\" width=\"2498\" charset=\"\">\n<figcaption>San Pedro Sula, Honduras.\n<p class=\"copyright\">Shutterstock.com</p>\n</figcaption>\n</figure><p>United will begin flying between Los Angeles and San Pedro Sula, Honduras on December 17 with three-times-weekly service until March 27, according to Cirium route data. Flights will operate on Thursdays, Saturdays, and Sundays with United having no competition on the route.&#160;</p><h2>Between San Francisco and Liberia, Costa Rica&#160;</h2><figure>\n\t<img src=\"https://i.insider.com/5f5a386de6ff30001d4e7fda?format=jpeg\" alt=\"Laguna del Hule in Costa Rica.\" height=\"1414\" width=\"1885\" charset=\"\">\n<figcaption>Costa Rica.\n<p class=\"copyright\">Kryssia Campos/Getty</p>\n</figcaption>\n</figure><p>United will begin flying between San Francisco and Liberia, Costa Rica on January 9, 2021, with Saturday-only service. An end date for the route or on which days of the week it will operate has not yet been announced but United will have no competition on the route.&#160;</p><h2>Between Los Angeles and Liberia, Costa Rica&#160;</h2><figure>\n\t<img src=\"https://i.insider.com/5f8dde7d9e9fe4001900a2ba?format=jpeg\" alt=\"Costa Rica\" height=\"1668\" width=\"2223\" charset=\"\">\n<figcaption>Liberia, Costa Rica.\n<p class=\"copyright\">Shutterstock.com</p>\n</figcaption>\n</figure><p>United will begin flying between Los Angeles and Liberia, Costa Rica on January 8, 2021, with three-times-weekly service. An end date for the route or which days of the week it will operate has not yet been announced but United will compete with JetBlue Airways, Delta Air Lines, and Alaska Airlines.</p><div 508_76afaa2504309a0e.webp","http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/businessinsider?d=qj6IDK7rITs":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx30/cdn79@2020_1/2020/10/20/02-05-18-571_740defb435ea442b.webp","http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/businessinsider?i=pJqAX6th1mk:TEXLO5gEMDc:gIN9vFwOqvQ":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx14/cdn55@2020_4/2020/10/20/02-05-25-187_38648a5a50b1b063.webp","http://feeds.feedburner.com/~r/businessinsider/~4/pJqAX6th1mk":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx13/cdn52@2020_4/2020/10/20/02-05-24-120_ec0290d81fb2c65d.webp"},"publishedOrCreatedDate":1603159473345},{"createdTime":"2020-10-20 10:04:33","updatedTime":"2020-10-20 10:04:33","title":"'The Witches' will premiere on HBO Max on October 22 — here's how to watch the new adaptation of Roald Dahl's classic book","link":"https://www.businessinsider.com/how-to-watch-the-witches-on-hbo-max","description":"<p class=\"financial-disclaimer\"><i>When you buy through our links, we may earn money from our affiliate partners. <a href=\"https://www.insider-inc.com/commerce-on-insider-inc/\">Learn more.</a></i></p><figure>\n\t<img src=\"https://i.insider.com/5f8de0f8c21cfb0019468d9e?format=jpeg\" alt=\"The Witches\" height=\"776\" width=\"1453\" charset=\"\">\n<figcaption>\n<p class=\"copyright\">&#34;The Witches&#34; / Warner Bros</p>\n</figcaption>\n</figure><ul class=\"summary-list\"><li>\"The Witches,\" starring Anne Hathaway and Octavia Spencer, will premiere on <a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/hbo-max-streaming-service\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">HBO Max</a> on October 22.</li><li>This new adaptation of Roald Dahl's classic 1983 novel was originally planned for theaters before the studio decided to make it a streaming release.</li><li>You'll need an HBO Max subscription ($14.99 a month) to watch \"The Witches,\" which is about as much as it would have cost to see in theaters.</li><li>Current <a href=\"https://www.hbomax.com/\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">HBO Max members</a> won't have to pay any extra fees to watch the movie, and most HBO cable subscribers can get HBO Max at no extra cost.</li><li>For detailed impressions on HBO Max, <a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/hbo-max-review\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">check out our full HBO Max review here</a>.&#160;</li></ul><p>A new film adaptation of Roald Dahl's classic children's book \"The Witches\" will premiere on HBO Max on October 22, just in time for Halloween.&#160;</p><p>Academy Award winners Anne Hathaway and Octavia Spencer star in the film; Hathaway plays the Grand High Witch, leader of a wicked coven, while Spencer plays the high-energy grandmother of the film's protagonist. \"The Witches\" is directed by Robert Zemeckis of \"Forrest Gump\" and \"Back to the Future\" fame, with Chris Rock serving as narrator.</p><iframe width=\"560\" height=\"315\" src=\"https://www.youtube.com/embed/clk2ClBOGTM\" frameborder=\"0\" allowfullscreen></iframe><p>This reimagining of \"The Witches\" is set in the American south during 1967, while Dahl's novel was published in 1983 and set in England. Spencer's character and her grandson (played by Jahzir Bruno) come across a witch conference at an Alabama hotel and eventually discover the witches' plot to turn children into mice.</p><p>\"The Witches\" was originally planned for a theatrical release, but the coronavirus pandemic has led Warner Bros. to pursue streaming premieres for several of its films this year. Warner Bros. also released \"Scoob!\" to home audiences after cancelling a May theater release and made it available to HBO Max subscribers in June. \"The Witches\" will look to capitalize on Halloween excitement with the holiday just days away and much of the world still practicing social distancing.</p><h2>How to watch 'The Witches' on HBO Max</h2><p>To watch \"The Witches\" when it's released on October 22, you'll need an <a href=\"https://www.hbomax.com/\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">HBO Max subscription</a>. The service costs $14.99 a month, and new members can receive a free seven-day trial.</p><p><a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/hbo-max-streaming-service\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">HBO Max</a> is an on-demand streaming service that combines HBO's original series and library of films with a huge catalog of additional movies and shows from sources like DC Comics, Turner Classic Movies, and Adult Swim.&#160;</p><p>HBO Max launched as a replacement for the <a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/hbo-go-vs-hbo-now-vs-hbo-max\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">HBO Now and HBO Go streaming services.</a> If you already subscribe to HBO through your cable provider, there's a good chance you can get HBO Max for free. You can see if your <a href=\"https://www.hbomax.com/do-i-already-have-access\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">current subscription supports HBO Max here</a>.</p><p>The HBO Max app is available on Android, iPhone, PlayStation, Xbox, <a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/google-chromecast-with-google-tv-review\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">Chromecast</a>, PC, Mac, Samsung TVs, and Apple TV. The app isn't available on Roku or Amazon Fire streaming devices yet.</p><p>Like all HBO Max content, \"The Witches\" will be limited to an HD resolution of 1080p; a spokesman for the service previously <a href=\"https://www.cnet.com/news/why-cant-hbo-max-support-4k-hdr-dolby-vision-when-netflix-and-disney-plus-can/\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">said that 4K streaming and HDR support will come to the app at a later date.</a></p><p>\"The Witches\" is exclusive to HBO Max in the US but will be released to other on-demand video services in the UK and Ireland on October 26. Viewers in those countries will be able to purchase the movie or rent it for 48 hours.</p><h2><strong>Where to watch more films inspired by Roald Dahl</strong></h2><p>Dahl's books have impacted multiple generations and inspired a wide range of films and other media adaptations. <a href=\"https://disneyplus.bn5x.net/c/196318/564546/9358?u=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.disneyplus.com%2F\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"nofollow noopener sponsored\">Disney Plus</a> is home to several Dahl adaptations, including \"James and the Giant Peach,\" \"The BFG,\" and \"Fantastic Mr. Fox.\" The most popular Dahl-inspired film, \"Willy Wonka &#38; The Chocolate Factory, \" is available to stream through <a href=\"https://www.freeform.com/\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">Freeform</a>, along with \"Matilda.\"</p><p>Jim Henson helped produce a British adaptation of \"The Witches\" in 1990; the film was a critical success but a commercial failure. You can watch the 1990 version of <a href=\"https://www.netflix.com/title/20282991\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">\"The Witches\" on Netflix now</a>, but know that Dahl disagreed with the filmmakers' decision to change the original ending of his novel for the screen.&#160;</p><p>Sources told Variety that the 2020 version of \"The Witches\" will stay closer to the story of the book, even though it's set during the American civil rights movement with Black protagonists.&#160;</p><p>All of these films are also available to buy or rent through <a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/how-to-rent-movies-online\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">digital streaming retailers</a>, like <a more.&#160;</p><div class=\"read-original\">Read the original article on <a href='https://www.businessinsider.com/how-to-watch-the-witches-on-hbo-max'>Business Insider</a></div><div 10:04:33","updatedTime":"2020-10-20 10:04:33","title":"Dow plunges 411 points as withering stimulus hopes prompt late sell-off","link":"https://www.businessinsider.com/stock-market-news-today-economic-stimulus-hurdles-coronavirus-cases-selloff-2020-10","description":"<figure>\n\t<img src=\"https://i.insider.com/5f46151742f43f001ddff0c8?format=jpeg\" alt=\"trader upset\" height=\"1000\" width=\"2000\" charset=\"\">\n<figcaption>\n<p class=\"copyright\">Getty Images</p>\n</figcaption>\n</figure><ul><li><strong>US stocks extended losses into Monday's close as a lack of stimulus progress cut into hopes for a pre-election deal.</strong></li><li><strong>House Speaker Nancy Pelosi expedited talks on Sunday, setting <a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/pelosi-says-stimulus-negotiators-have-48-hours-to-reach-agreement-2020-10\">a 48-hour deadline</a> for the White House and Democrats to ink a deal. She later told Democrats that significant obstacles in reaching a compromise remain.</strong></li><li><strong>Even if an agreement is reached, the bill is set to die in the Senate as Republicans push a $500 billion measure.</strong></li><li><strong>The US notched its fifth-straight day of more than 50,000 new cases, reviving fears of new lockdowns and a hit to economic recovery.</strong></li><li><strong><a href=\"https://markets.businessinsider.com/indices\">Watch major indexes update live here</a>.</strong></li></ul><hr><p>US equities tumbled on Monday as fading stimulus hopes slammed investor sentiments.</p><p>House Speaker Nancy Pelosi <a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/pelosi-says-stimulus-negotiators-have-48-hours-to-reach-agreement-2020-10\">established a 48-hour deadline on Sunday</a> for the White House and Democrats to reach a compromise on fresh fiscal relief. She and Treasury Secretary Steven Mnuchin held multiple talks over the weekend on a deal.</p><p>While the White House hasn't yet officially upped its $1.8 trillion counteroffer to Pelosi's $2.2 trillion proposal, President Donald Trump repeated calls for a deal larger than the two options.</p><p>Stocks extended their slide in the afternoon after Pelosi told Democrats that significant disagreements between the party and the White House remain. With a single day left for the two to reach a deal, optimism for pre-election stimulus is all but dead.&#160;</p><p><strong>Here's where US indexes stood at the 4 p.m. ET market close on Monday:</strong></p><ul><li><strong><a href=\"https://markets.businessinsider.com/index/s&p_500?utm_source=markets&utm_medium=ingest?utm_source=markets&utm_medium=ingest?utm_source=markets&utm_medium=ingest?utm_source=markets&utm_medium=ingest?utm_source=markets&utm_medium=ingest?utm_source=markets&utm_medium=ingestarkets&#38;utm_medium=ingest\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">S&#38;P 500</a>:</strong> 3,426.92, down 1.6%</li><li><strong><a href=\"https://markets.businessinsider.com/index/dow_jones?utm_source=markets&utm_medium=ingest?utm_source=markets&utm_medium=ingest?utm_source=markets&utm_medium=ingest?utm_source=markets&utm_medium=ingest?utm_source=markets&utm_medium=ingest?utm_source=markets&utm_medium=ingestts&#38;utm_medium=ingest\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">Dow Jones industrial average</a>:</strong> 28,195.42, down 1.4% (411 points)</li><li><strong><a href=\"https://markets.businessinsider.com/index/nasdaq_composite?utm_source=markets&utm_medium=ingest?utm_source=markets&utm_medium=ingest?utm_source=markets&utm_medium=ingest?utm_source=markets&utm_medium=ingest?utm_source=markets&utm_medium=ingest?utm_source=markets&utm_medium=ingestts&#38;utm_medium=ingest\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">Nasdaq composite</a>:</strong> 11,478.88, down 1.7%</li></ul><p><em><strong>Read more:</strong> <a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/stock-picks-to-buy-6-financial-firms-recovery-bank-america-2020-10\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">BANK OF AMERICA: Buy these 6 financial-sector stocks that offer the most attractive risk-reward combo as the economy improves</a></em></p><p>Even if a deal is reached ahead of the Tuesday deadline, Senate Republicans are set to kill the package. Senate Majority Leader Mitch McConnell plans to bring a $500 billion measure to a vote on Tuesday and continues to oppose any larger measure. Democrats are set to block the piecemeal bill, essentially leaving both parties stuck in attempts to pass their own packages.</p><p>\"It seems politicians are determined to show that they are trying to get the next additional stimulus package done, but no one should count on action this year,\" Edward Moya, senior market analyst at Oanda, said.</p><p>Concerns around rising COVID-19 case counts throughout the US also weighed on valuations. Daily new cases surpassed 50,000 for five days in a row, reigniting fears of a second lockdown or stymied economic growth.</p><p>Global cases tore above 40 million on Monday, further fueling anxiety around a prolonged economic slump.</p><p><em><strong>Read more:</strong> <a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/stock-picks-to-buy-etf-strategy-cathie-wood-ark-invest-2020-10\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">Cathie Wood runs 5 funds that more than doubled broader market returns in the 3rd quarter. She and her team break down 8 winning stocks turbocharging the outperformance of its top ETFs.</a></em></p><p>The Monday slump follows a small rally that closed out last week. <a href=\"https://markets.businessinsider.com/news/stocks/stock-market-news-today-indexes-rally-retail-sales-stimulus-deadlock-2020-10-1029689752\">Stocks gained on Friday</a> after retail sales <a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/us-retail-sales-beat-september-estimates-economic-recovery-coronavirus-recession-2020-10?utm_source=markets&utm_medium=ingestgest\">beat expectations in September</a>, signaling stronger-than-expected consumer spending trends heading into the holiday season. The University of Michigan's consumer sentiment gauge also beat estimates for a preliminary October reading, adding to hopes that the US economic recovery can continue without near-term fiscal support.</p><p>All 11 S&#38;P 500 sectors fell through the day. Utilities and materials names fared the best, while tech and communications stocks tumbled the most.</p><p><a href=\"https://markets.businessinsider.com/stocks/cxo-stock\">Concho</a> erased early gains fueled by oil giant <a href=\"https://markets.businessinsider.com/stocks/cop-stock\">ConocoPhillips</a> announcing it will buy the firm in a $9.7 billion deal. The acquisition marks the first major oil-industry deal since its collapse at the start of the pandemic.</p><p><a href=\"https://markets.businessinsider.com/stocks/amc-stock?utm_source=markets&utm_medium=ingestgest\">AMC Entertainment</a> jumped after the theater chain announced it will reopen locations in New York and Long Island.&#160;</p><p><em><strong>Read more:</strong> <a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/stock-picks-to-buy-small-companies-recommendations-high-upside-rbc-2020-10\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\" data-analytics-position=\"4\" data-analytics-module=\"\">Buy these 7 unheralded stocks right now for near-term upside of at least 25% as growth accelerates to a new level, RBC says</a></em></p><p><a href=\"https://markets.businessinsider.com/stocks/tsla-stock?utm_source=markets&utm_medium=ingestgest\">Tesla</a> initially gained after Wedbush analysts <a href=\"https://markets.businessinsider.com/news/stocks/tesla-stock-price-target-lifted-china-demand-deliveries-pace-wedbush-2020-10-1029693540\">raised their price target for the stock to $500</a>, implying a 14% rally from Friday's close. The team praised the automaker's better-than-expected deliveries in the third quarter, adding Tesla is on track to hit 500,000 deliveries this year. Still, the broader market downturn dragged on Tesla through the afternoon.</p><p>Spot <a href=\"https://markets.businessinsider.com/commodities/gold-price\">gold</a> rose as much as 1% to $1,918.61 per ounce before paring gains. Treasury yields climbed and the US dollar fell against a basket of major peers.</p><p>Oil futures whipsawed and notched losses by the end of the trading day. <a href=\"https://markets.businessinsider.com/commodities/oil-price?type=wti?utm_source=markets&utm_medium=ingestgest\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">West Texas Intermediate crude</a> fell as much as 0.8%, to $40.54 per barrel. <a href=\"https://markets.businessinsider.com/commodities/oil-price?utm_source=markets&utm_medium=ingest?utm_source=markets&utm_medium=ingest?utm_source=markets&utm_medium=ingest?utm_source=markets&utm_medium=ingest?utm_source=markets&utm_medium=ingest?utm_source=markets&utm_medium=ingest?utm_source=markets&utm_medium=ingest?utm_source=markets&utm_medium=ingestce=markets&#38;utm_medium=ingest\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">Brent crude</a>, oil's international benchmark, sank 1.3%, to $42.36 per barrel, at intraday lows.</p><p><em><strong>Now read more markets coverage from Markets Insider and Business Insider:</strong></em></p><p><strong><em><a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/investing-strategy-4-stocks-to-buy-market-leaders-nancy-zevenbergen-2020-10\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">Nancy Zevenbergen is in the top 1% of investors over the past 5 years. href=\"https://www.anrdoezrs.net/links/6415797/type/dlg/https://www.blueapron.com/\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener nofollow nofollow sponsored nofollow sponsored nofollow sponsored nofollow deals.</a></strong></li></ul><div id=\"ProductCard_5e0a6894855cc2130d16a597\" style=\"position:relative; display:block; width: 100%\"><iframe src=\"https://produktor.businessinsider.com/productCardService?id=5e0a6894855cc2130d16a597&type=small&live=true\" width=\"100%\" height=\"150%\" frameborder=\"0\" allowfullscreen=\"\" style=\"position:absolute; top:0; left: 0\"></iframe></div><bi-shortcode id=\"table-of-contents-sticky\" class=\"mceNonEditable\" data-type=\"h2\">Table of Contents: Masthead Sticky</bi-shortcode><p>If ever there was a cure to your Seamless obsession, it's another kind of delivery — the meal kit delivery. Here to save you from the never-ending rotation of takeout, these meal kits are re-introducing you to your kitchen in all its wonder. As it turns out, your stove is just as important as your microwave.</p><p>But just as it can be a challenge to pick your favorite take-out restaurant, it can be difficult to pick your favorite meal kit delivery service. We've taste-tested plenty of brands to put together our comprehensive buying guide, which you can <a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/best-meal-kit-delivery-service\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">check out here</a>, but we're also helping narrow down your decision-making process with comparison pieces like this. It's a tough job, but someone has to do it.</p><p>Both <a href=\"https://www.anrdoezrs.net/links/6415797/type/dlg/https://www.blueapron.com/\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener nofollow nofollow sponsored nofollow sponsored nofollow sponsored nofollow sponsored nofollow sponsored\">Blue Apron</a> and <a href=\"http://www.anrdoezrs.net/links/6415797/type/dlg/sid/biip_051719_blue-apron-vs-hellofresh/https://www.hellofresh.com/\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener nofollow nofollow sponsored\">HelloFresh</a> are veritable giants on the meal kit scene. They've been around for years, and have built up a loyal base of followers thanks to their tasty recipes, wide selections, and ability to cater to various dietary restrictions. Both feature solid produce and protein options and are fantastic for a date night activity.</p><p>But there are certainly some aspects in which Blue Apron and HelloFresh begin to differentiate themselves from one another, and that's really how you'll be making your decision. Here are our thoughts after testing both.</p><h2><strong>Ease of use&#160;&#160;</strong></h2><p><a href=\"https://www.anrdoezrs.net/links/6415797/type/dlg/https://www.blueapron.com/\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener nofollow nofollow sponsored nofollow sponsored\"><figure>\n\t<img src=\"https://i.insider.com/5ce6afaf9252e330d174c1a7?format=jpeg\" alt=\"Blue Apron vs HelloFresh Graphic 2\" height=\"601\" width=\"1201\" charset=\"\">\n<figcaption>\n<p class=\"copyright\">Alyssa Powell/Business Insider</p>\n</figcaption>\n</figure></a></p><p>If we're thinking in terms of pure convenience, HelloFresh is a bit easier to use than Blue Apron. While both are extremely convenient, <a href=\"http://www.anrdoezrs.net/links/6415797/type/dlg/sid/biip_051719_blue-apron-vs-hellofresh/https://www.hellofresh.com/\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener nofollow\">HelloFresh</a> is more focused on providing meals that are truly no fuss, and as a result, can be ready in just a matter of minutes.</p><p><a href=\"https://www.anrdoezrs.net/links/6415797/type/dlg/https://www.blueapron.com/\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener nofollow nofollow sponsored\">Blue Apron</a>, on the other hand, sometimes requires just a bit more prep work or expertise — as a tradeoff, however, you may find Blue Apron's meals a bit more complex and interesting.</p><p>I've found many of HelloFresh's recipes to be a bit more straightforward and easy to follow, which is ideal for the beginner chef. If you're just looking to dip your toe into culinary waters and are beginning to make your way around four burners and an oven, then <a href=\"http://www.anrdoezrs.net/links/6415797/type/dlg/sid/biip_051719_blue-apron-vs-hellofresh/https://www.hellofresh.com/\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener nofollow\">HelloFresh</a> certainly seems a bit less intimidating.</p><p>While both <a href=\"https://www.anrdoezrs.net/links/6415797/type/dlg/https://www.blueapron.com/\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener nofollow nofollow sponsored\">Blue Apron</a> and HelloFresh's directions are very clear, it often seems as though HelloFresh's recipes simply require fewer steps. Not only is that ideal for the beginner chef, but it's also well-suited for folks who perhaps are in a bit more of a rush. And if your main draw to a meal kit is convenience through and through, then HelloFresh is the way to go.</p><p><strong>Winner: <a href=\"http://www.anrdoezrs.net/links/6415797/type/dlg/sid/biip_051719_blue-apron-vs-hellofresh/https://www.hellofresh.com/\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener nofollow\">HelloFresh</a></strong></p><hr><h2><strong>Recipe quality and creativity </strong></h2><p>What <a href=\"https://www.anrdoezrs.net/links/6415797/type/dlg/https://www.blueapron.com/\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener nofollow nofollow sponsored nofollow sponsored nofollow sponsored nofollow sponsored\">Blue Apron</a> may lack in convenience, it makes up for in creativity. The meal kit service is looking to put a bit of a gourmet spin on home cooking, and consequently, if you're looking to expand your horizons a bit, you'll be able to do so with Blue Apron.</p><p>I appreciate the internationally-inspired meals like Mushroom Tempura Rice Bowl or Crispy za'atar Chicken Tenders, which have the capacity to introduce cooks not only to new flavors but perhaps new techniques as well. Indeed, it's not all that often that you'll find meal kits making use of ingredients like fregola sarda, but Blue Apron could make it a staple in your kitchen.</p><p>For slightly more experienced chefs, Blue Apron is an ideal way to begin to expand horizons and check out different flavor combinations in a relatively risk-free environment. I've also had a number of friends adapt Blue Apron recipes to their own needs, something that seems more unique to this particular meal kit service than any other that I've tried.</p><p><strong>Winner: <a href=\"https://www.anrdoezrs.net/links/6415797/type/dlg/https://www.blueapron.com/\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener nofollow nofollow sponsored nofollow sponsored nofollow sponsored\">Blue Apron</a></strong></p><hr><h2><strong>Ability to cater to dietary preferences</strong></h2><p><a href=\"http://www.anrdoezrs.net/links/6415797/type/dlg/sid/biip_051719_blue-apron-vs-hellofresh/https://www.hellofresh.com/\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener nofollow\"><figure>\n\t<img src=\"https://i.insider.com/5ce6aeeddf29c82dba7a5448?format=jpeg\" alt=\"Blue Apron vs HelloFresh Graphic 3\" height=\"601\" width=\"1201\" charset=\"\">\n<figcaption>\n<p class=\"copyright\">Alyssa Powell/Business Insider</p>\n</figcaption>\n</figure></a></p><p><a href=\"http://www.anrdoezrs.net/links/6415797/type/dlg/sid/biip_051719_blue-apron-vs-hellofresh/https://www.hellofresh.com/\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener nofollow\">HelloFresh</a> has recently become something of a meal kit behemoth, acquiring a number of smaller meal kit services including Green Chef. As a result, HelloFresh now offers a wide range of menus, including pescatarian, paleo, and vegetarian options.</p><p>While Blue Apron also offers some menus that are catered specifically toward these various dietary restrictions, they're not quite as well-curated as those of HelloFresh. As a result, if you're really looking to satisfy very specific dining or cooking habits, you may have a slightly easier time picking out your weekly menu through HelloFresh.</p><p>While <a href=\"https://www.anrdoezrs.net/links/6415797/type/dlg/https://www.blueapron.com/\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener nofollow nofollow sponsored nofollow sponsored nofollow sponsored\">Blue Apron</a> also caters to different needs, it's a bit more difficult to actually narrow down your search by way of specific filters, so HelloFresh is a clear winner in this category.</p><p><strong>Winner: <a href=\"http://www.anrdoezrs.net/links/6415797/type/dlg/sid/biip_051719_blue-apron-vs-hellofresh/https://www.hellofresh.com/\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener nofollow\">HelloFresh</a></strong></p><hr><h2><strong>Taste</strong></h2><p><a href=\"https://www.anrdoezrs.net/links/6415797/type/dlg/https://www.blueapron.com/\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener nofollow nofollow sponsored\"><strong><figure>\n\t<img src=\"https://i.insider.com/5707fcc091058422008bb885?format=jpeg\" alt=\"Blue Apron\" height=\"2448\" width=\"3264\" charset=\"\">\n<figcaption>\n<p class=\"copyright\">Hayley Peterson</p>\n</figcaption>\n</figure></strong></a></p><p>Perhaps the deciding factor when it comes to picking a meal kit, taste is inevitably a subjective metric. I will say that given the variety of meals that I've been able to experience through <a href=\"http://www.anrdoezrs.net/links/6415797/type/dlg/sid/biip_051719_blue-apron-vs-hellofresh/https://www.hellofresh.com/\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">HelloFresh</a> with its many different menu options, there is more room for exploration through this service.</p><p>However, it's not always the case that all recipes are equally delicious. I've found that some HelloFresh meals are much more interesting than others and that there's more variation in terms of the level of quality.</p><p><a href=\"https://www.anrdoezrs.net/links/6415797/type/dlg/https://www.blueapron.com/\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener nofollow nofollow sponsored nofollow sponsored nofollow sponsored\">Blue Apron</a>, on the other hand, seems a bit more reliable in terms of quality. Though there may be a slightly lesser range of options available, I know that all options will be equally delicious.</p><p><strong>Winner: <a href=\"https://www.anrdoezrs.net/links/6415797/type/dlg/https://www.blueapron.com/\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener nofollow nofollow sponsored nofollow sponsored nofollow sponsored\">Blue Apron</a></strong></p><hr><h2><strong>Price</strong></h2><p>The best way to compare meal kit prices is by meal and serving.&#160;<a href=\"http://blueapron.i3zp.net/c/196318/151480/2880?subId1=biip_051719_blue-apron-vs-hellofresh-apron-hello-fresh-discounts-coupon&u=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.blueapron.com%2Fm%2F\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener nofollow\"></a></p><p><a href=\"https://www.anrdoezrs.net/links/6415797/type/dlg/https://www.blueapron.com/\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener nofollow nofollow sponsored nofollow sponsored nofollow sponsored\">Blue Apron</a> costs $9.99 per serving and $7.99 in shipping if you opt for two recipes that feed two people a week. This totals $47.95 for one week. <a href=\"http://www.anrdoezrs.net/links/6415797/type/dlg/sid/biip_051719_blue-apron-vs-hellofresh/https://www.hellofresh.com/\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener nofollow\">HelloFresh</a> will cost you $11.99 per serving for two recipes that feed two people a week and will also tack on an additional $7.99 for shipping. This totals $55.95 for one week's worth of meals. If we're going by this math, Blue Apron wins this one.&#160;</p><p>However, there are ongoing introductory deals that'll drop the cost down a bit, though the deals might change over time. Currently, Blue Apron is giving new subscribers $60 off their first three orders and&#160;HelloFresh is offering <a href=\"https://www.anrdoezrs.net/links/6415797/type/dlg/https://www.hellofresh.com/pages/coupon-codes-and-promotions\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"nofollow noopener sponsored\">$30 off your first two orders</a>, or 10% off your first five orders. HelloFresh has <a href=\"https://www.anrdoezrs.net/links/6415797/type/dlg/https://www.hellofresh.com/pages/coupon-codes-and-promotions\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"nofollow noopener sponsored\">a webpage for its current discounts</a> and prices are while Blue Apron doesn't so you'd have to do some digging on Google.&#160;</p><p>Even though Blue Apron has a lower base price when you compare two weekly recipes for two people, the various discounts make it too difficult to call one of these services as the true winner.</p><p><strong>Winner: Too close to call&#160;</strong></p><hr><h2><strong>The bottom line: Too close to call</strong></h2><p><a href=\"http://www.anrdoezrs.net/links/6415797/type/dlg/sid/biip_051719_blue-apron-vs-hellofresh/https://www.hellofresh.com/\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener nofollow\"><figure>\n\t<img src=\"https://i.insider.com/5ce6b03518fe60337a11b9f6?format=jpeg\" alt=\"Blue Apron vs HelloFresh Graphic 1\" height=\"752\" width=\"1201\" charset=\"\">\n<figcaption>\n<p class=\"copyright\">Alyssa Powell/Business Insider</p>\n</figcaption>\n</figure></a></p><p>The choice between <a href=\"http://www.anrdoezrs.net/links/6415797/type/dlg/sid/biip_051719_blue-apron-vs-hellofresh/https://www.hellofresh.com/\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener nofollow nofollow\">HelloFresh</a> and <a href=\"https://www.anrdoezrs.net/links/6415797/type/dlg/https://www.blueapron.com/\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener nofollow nofollow sponsored nofollow sponsored nofollow sponsored\">Blue Apron</a> ultimately comes down to convenience and your desire for new flavor profiles. If your priority is a quick, convenient, and delicious dinner, then HelloFresh becomes the obvious winner.</p><p>On the other hand, if you're looking to do a bit more exploration with your cooking and are eager to try out new techniques, then Blue Apron is the one for you. Either way, you'll be doing yourself a favor by giving takeout a day off.</p><div id=\"ProductCard_5e0a6894855cc2130d16a597\" style=\"position:relative; display:block; width: 100%\"><iframe src=\"https://produktor.businessinsider.com/productCardService?id=5e0a6894855cc2130d16a597&type=small&live=true\" width=\"100%\" height=\"150%\" frameborder=\"0\" allowfullscreen=\"\" 10:04:33","updatedTime":"2020-10-20 10:04:33","title":"Aeroflot Airlines crew members helped smuggle $50 million worth of stolen iPads, iPhones, and more into Russia, a government investigation has found","link":"https://www.businessinsider.com/aeroflot-airlines-employees-50-million-smuggling-scheme-apple-iphone-ipad-2020-10","description":"<figure>\n\t<img src=\"https://i.insider.com/5f8dde3c9e9fe4001900a2b8?format=jpeg\" alt=\"aeroflot airlines\" height=\"3388\" width=\"4518\" charset=\"\">\n<figcaption>Aeroflot Airlines.\n<p class=\"copyright\">Dmitry Feoktistov\\TASS via Getty Images</p>\n</figcaption>\n</figure><ul class=\"summary-list\">\n<li>The US arrested 10 people in connection with a plot to use current and former Aeroflot Airlines crew members to smuggle $50 million in stolen electronics to Russia.</li>\n<li>The Department of State has revoked 113 visas of Aeroflot employees in connection to the scheme.&#160;</li>\n<li>Aeroflot reported a loss of $485 million in <a href=\"https://www.reuters.com/article/us-russia-aeroflot-results/russias-aeroflot-falls-to-second-quarter-loss-as-air-traffic-tumbles-idUSKBN25R1B0\">August</a> due to stunted travel during the coronavirus pandemic.</li>\n<li><a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/?hprecirc-bullet\">Visit Business Insider's homepage for more stories</a>.</li>\n</ul><p>A US investigation found current and former Aeroflot Airlines employees helped to smuggle $50 million in stolen electronic devices to Russia.</p><p>The investigation, conducted by the FBI, Customs and Border Protection, the New York City Police Department, and other agencies, alleges 10 defendants of smuggling $50 million worth of electronic devices using current and former Aeroflot Airlines workers. The devices included iPhones, iPads, and Apple Watches.&#160;</p><p>An inspection of crew members' luggage found millions of dollars of electronic devices, \"many of which\" had been stolen, per a <a href=\"https://www.justice.gov/usao-edny/pr/ten-individuals-charged-50-million-russian-smuggling-scheme\">release</a>. Federal officers arrested eight leaders of the scheme Monday afternoon, while two others are fugitives.</p><p>The Department of State has revoked 113 visas of Aeroflot employees in connection with the scheme.&#160;</p><p>\"As alleged, the defendants were members of an international smuggling ring that used a network of operators here and in Russia to circumvent US export laws and regulations,\" United States Attorney DuCharme stated in a <a href=\"https://www.justice.gov/usao-edny/pr/ten-individuals-charged-50-million-russian-smuggling-scheme\">release</a>.</p><p>The airline industry in particular has suffered from lost revenue and service this year as the COVID-19 pandemic stymied travel, per the <a href=\"https://www.iata.org/en/pressroom/pr/2020-03-05-01/\">International Air Transport Association</a>. Aeroflot reported a loss of $485 million in <a href=\"https://www.reuters.com/article/us-russia-aeroflot-results/russias-aeroflot-falls-to-second-quarter-loss-as-air-traffic-tumbles-idUSKBN25R1B0\">August</a>.</p><p>Police in the UK had arrested another former flight attendant for <a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/flight-attendant-deal-drugs-uk-pandemic-coronavirus-2020-9\">dealing drugs after getting laid off</a>.</p><p>Aeroflot Airlines, one of the world's <a href=\"https://www.aeroflot.ru/us-en/about/aeroflot_today/aeroflot_history/history\">oldest carriers</a>, is currently valued at $12.5 million.</p><p>Aeroflot Airlines did not immediately respond to Business Insider's request for comment.</p><p><em>If you have information to share, you can reach the author at aakhtar@businessinsider.com.</em></p><div
